Name: YouShift
Headline: We automate doctor shift scheduling to save time and reduce burnout.
Description: We make scheduling for doctors fast, easy, and stress-free. By blending complex hospital rules with personal preferences, our algorithm generates smart, conflict-free schedules that save time and improve work-life balance. With seamless shift swaps and real-time updates, schedules remain flexible and always up-to-date.
Founder1_Description: Cofounder and CPO at YouShift. Improving doctors' lives through easy, fast, and fair scheduling. Previously at Harvard CS
Founder2_Description:
YouShift, automating shift-scheduling for hospitals
Worked as a Software Engineer in Google Ads Infrastructure building the largest, low-latency and reliable mechanism to load and serve key-value data across Google Ads.
Studied Computer Science at Harvard University graduating with honors.
Founder3_Description: Originally from Barcelona, I studied Biomedical Science at University College London and Harvard. I am the co-founder of YouShift, a SaaS platform that automates shift scheduling for hospitals, helping healthcare professionals achieve better work-life balance and reduce burnout.

One-click shift assignment

## Let our algorithm do the heavy lifting

Generate a fully compliant, preference-driven schedule in seconds. With a single click, our advanced algorithm considers every rule and personal request, delivering a perfectly balanced calendar—and saving you a mountain of manual work.

Preference-based assignments

## Empower your team with choice

Enhance work-life balance by letting your staff indicate preferred shifts, days off, or reduced availability. We factor in these preferences through a points system, ensuring everyone feels valued while still meeting operational needs.

Streamlined manual editing

## Own your schedule while we handle the math

Prefer a hands-on approach? No problem. Our intelligent manual assignment tool comes packed with real-time checks and guidance that flag any rule violations. Allocate shifts with confidence, knowing our system keeps you on track with both rules and preferences.

Custom Scheduling Rules

## Build the perfect schedule for any requirement

Create and enforce your own scheduling rules with ease—whether it's max working hours, mandatory rest times, or specialized shifts. Our flexible system lets you adapt to any legal or contractual requirement, no matter how unique.

All-in-one time off management

## Vacation and conferences made easy

Handle every absence seamlessly—from planned vacations to last-minute conference trips. Requests and approvals happen in-app, so everyone stays informed about who's out and when. No more guesswork or double-booking.

Effortless shift swaps

## Stay up to date with one source of truth

Let team members trade schedules directly in the platform—real-time updates keep everyone on the same page. Your workforce stays flexible while you maintain full visibility.

Data-driven insights

## Track hours, balance workloads, boost morale

Get a comprehensive view of who's working when, where, and how much. With powerful analytics, you can customize overtime calculations, compare workloads, and ensure no one is overworked. Empower fair, transparent scheduling.

Name: assistant-ui
Headline: Open Source Typescript/React Library for AI Chat
Description: assistant-ui helps frontend developers add AI chat to their apps. Our product is used by several dozen companies, like LangChain, Stack AI, Browser Use, and Athena Intelligence. We're building an open source Typescript/React library and a backend as a service, with first class integrations into popular agent frameworks like LangGraph and Vercel AI SDK.
Founder1_Description: Simon is the Founder and CEO of assistant-ui. Before assistant-ui, he co-founded and exited READO, a book recommendation engine and community with over 140k monthly active users. Simon is a hacker at heart - he started coding at age 12 and has won 8 hackathons. Simon grew up in Iran and Germany and moved to the San Francisco early 2024.

# 💬 assistant-ui - Open Source Typescript/React Library for AI Chat
The UX of ChatGPT in your own app, connected to your own AI agents.
**Simon Farshid**
[assistant-ui](https://www.ycombinator.com/launches/</companies/assistant-ui>)
5 days ago
[ ](https://www.ycombinator.com/launches/<https:/twitter.com/intent/tweet?text=assistant-ui+just+launched+on+%40ycombinator%27s+Launch+YC%21%0A%0A%F0%9F%92%AC+assistant-ui+-+Open+Source+Typescript%2FReact+Library+for+AI+Chat.+Check+them+out%3A&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.ycombinator.com%2Flaunches%2FMnc-assistant-ui-open-source-typescript-react-library-for-ai-chat>)
Embed
<https://assistant-ui.com>
#generative_ai#developer_tools
Hi YC! I’m Simon, building **assistant-ui** , an open source Typescript/React library for AI chat.
Hundreds of projects use assistant-ui to build in-app AI assistants, including companies like:
![](https://bookface.ycombinator.com/media/?type=post&id=87644&key=user_uploads/1152943/d3eda556-de8c-4404-b4be-c0295f9aeb8e)
With >50k+ monthly downloads, assistant-ui is the most popular UI library for AI chat.
## **Getting Started**
You can get started by running **`npx assistant-ui create`** (new project) or **`npx assistant-ui init`** (existing project) in your terminal.
![](https://bookface.ycombinator.com/media/?type=post&id=87644&key=user_uploads/1152943/17c78ae1-d8cf-4fc4-a8aa-056fe449da02)
## **Features**
  * **Pre-built components** , fully customizable
  * **Connects to your backend**
    * We have first class integration for **AI SDK** and **LangGraph** or build your own
  * **Generative UI** : Map LLM tool calls and JSONs to custom UI components
  * **Frontend Tool Calls:** Let LLMs take action in your frontend app
  * **Human Tool Calls:** Human approvals and input collection
  * **Chat history and analytics** via assistant-cloud (the hosted offering)


## **Customization**
The API of assistant-ui is inspired by libraries like **Radix UI** and **cmdk**. Instead of a single monolithic chat component, we give you composable primitives and a great starter configuration. You have full control over the look and feel of every pixel while leaving auto-scrolling, LLM streaming and accessibility to us.
![](https://www.ycombinator.com/media/?type=post&id=87644&key=user_uploads/1152943/d8eacc69-2d94-4c43-8fab-2dcac5e7f029)
Sample customization to make a perplexity lookalike:
![](https://www.ycombinator.com/media/?type=post&id=87644&key=user_uploads/1152943/16e96ae2-d563-4f6c-9047-6c3485a1cb3d)
## **Demo Video**
[Demo Video](https://www.ycombinator.com/launches/<https:/youtu.be/9eLKs9AM4tU?si=jm9GzoFAcyM_tPT->)
## **About**
I’ve wanted to build my own dev tool company since high school. Last year, I built the first version of assistant-ui because I needed the UX of ChatGPT in my own app. The app I was building didn’t work out, but few friends asked me about the chat UI. Since then, AI chat has became increasingly popular as a means for delegating tasks to AI agents. My focus is on enabling human <> agent collaboration through better UX and AX (agent experience).
![](https://bookface.ycombinator.com/media/?type=post&id=87644&key=user_uploads/1152943/d43c8332-b160-40d8-8f27-849bd82806e3)

### What is SAMMY though, really?

## The Future of PLG

> SAMMY is an Al that explores your app like a real user, mapping every possible click to generate content, onboard users and spot issues. It updates automatically with every product change, keeping everything running smoothly. It may feel like magic, but it’s just powerful technology at work.

Doc & Video Tutorial generation

## 3 Steps to Automation

>

> **Step 2: SAMMY Creates**
>
> You asses the content (user-walkthroughs, videos, documentation/guides and more).
>
> **Step 3: SAMMY Grows**
>
> As your product evolves, everything updates automagically (see what we did there).

#### Secure

SOC 2, GDPR, and HIPAA compliant for total peace of mind. Data is encrypted at every stage, keeping your product and user info safe.

Strict access controls ensure only authorized teams can view or edit results

![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/G2UWc9fHVShZvr2GZVhFgfanJM.png)

#### Proven Results

Results speak louder than words. Deployed across 10+ industries, driving faster releases and fewer production issues. Backed by success stories from startups and enterprise clients alike.

#### All-in-One

Unified platform for testing, documentation, onboarding, and more. New modules released every month and on request.

### Connectivity

Whether you're using Zendesk, Intercom or even an in-house solution; Playwright, Selenium or hand-written scripts; whatever you use - connectivity is in our blood, we're here to help.

![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/KA6iJDBWGdGOXEm8NfC6ABBpuk.png)

## Pricing

Name: General Trajectory
Headline: Physical AI for industrial robots.
Description:
General Trajectory is building AI for the physical world.

We are training vision-language-action (VLA) models across different embodiments to automate tasks such as palletization, sorting, picking, and packing.
Founder1_Description: Recent graduate focusing on general AI for industrial robots. Background is in academic ML research.
markdown:
# General-purpose AI for industrial robots.

After AI automates computer work, the next bottleneck is the physical world. We're training general policies that can automate economically valuable work in the real world.

[Join the Waitlist](https://www.generaltrajectory.com/waitlist)

Backed By [![Y Combinator](https://www.generaltrajectory.com/ycombinator-logo.png)](https://www.ycombinator.com/)

## What We Do

**General Trajectory** is building AI for the physical world. We believe that physical AI can create a future with an abundance of goods and services for all of humanity.

We are starting with industrial tasks like palletization, sorting, and picking using mobile manipulators.

![Boston Dynamics](https://www.generaltrajectory.com/bostondynamics.png)

Credit to Boston Dynamics

## Research

A vision-language-action model (VLA) breaks down a high-level goal into an executable sequence of steps. Communication with the robot and its integration is no different than any other AI system—you just tell it what you want it to do in English. We are training highly capable VLAs across different embodiments for a variety of economically-valuable tasks.

As simulators improve, so does the quality of the synthetic data we are able to collect. This presents a promising avenue for increasingly capable models without traditional data bottlenecks.

Credit to Nvidia Research

### Ready to Automate Your Work Environment?

Let’s collaborate to bring AI into the real world.

[Join the Waitlist](https://www.generaltrajectory.com/waitlist)

Name: Scout
Headline: AI-powered student information system for K-12 schools
Description:
The student information system (SIS) is the core system of record in every K-12 school. It tracks students, attendance, grades, schedules, staff, and more - kind of like the ERP for schools.

Legacy SIS providers do just about that, and not much more. School districts layer dozens of tools on top of their SIS to fill in the gaps.

Scout is an AI-powered student information system that automates school- and district-wide busywork, from day-to-day operations like attendance tracking to annual compliance reports. Our mission is to help school districts run like high-performing organizations, enabling them to provide high-quality, personalized instruction to every student.
Founder1_Description: Building software for educators
Founder2_Description: Building the next generation of digital infrastructure for America's schools
markdown:
[![Company Logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66f8456c64b489d660cbeec8/67918a5a454bb2ea9c752c12_LogoFull.svg)](https://www.scoutforschools.com/)

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66f8456c64b489d660cbeec8/66f8456d64b489d660cbef22_Hamburger%20icon.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66f8456c64b489d660cbeec8/66f8456d64b489d660cbef31_close.svg)

# The AI-powered SIS for independent study schools.

Scout automates the busywork and frees up more than 50% of teacher time.

Build a comprehensive understanding of each school, classroom, and student by analyzing grade data across all of your platforms.

[Book a demo](https://calendly.com/noah-teachwithscout)

**Attendance Tracking**

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66f8456c64b489d660cbeec8/67980d89f7856129542d9e9c_Screenshot%202025-01-27%20at%202.48.09%E2%80%AFPM.png)

**Work Sample Collection**

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66f8456c64b489d660cbeec8/67980d8914d4a55965b4cb5d_Screenshot%202025-01-27%20at%202.49.28%E2%80%AFPM.png)

[Watch Video](https://www.scoutforschools.com/#)

**CALPADS Reporting**

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66f8456c64b489d660cbeec8/679816ceb0a67afbb3085865_Screenshot%202025-01-27%20at%203.28.58%E2%80%AFPM.png)

[Watch Video](https://www.scoutforschools.com/#)

# Automate the busywork.

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66f8456c64b489d660cbeec8/66f8456d64b489d660cbefd8_check%20White.svg)

**Track attendance without lifting a finger.**

Scout proactively reaches out to parents to track attendance by phone, text, email, or in the Scout app.

[Watch Video](https://www.scoutforschools.com/#)

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66f8456c64b489d660cbeec8/66f8456d64b489d660cbefd8_check%20White.svg)

**Get master agreements signed.**

Scout generates master agreements and addendums automatically, chasing parents and students for signature.

[Watch Video](https://www.scoutforschools.com/#)

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66f8456c64b489d660cbeec8/66f8456d64b489d660cbefd8_check%20White.svg)

**Log engagement with countless integrations.**

Scout syncs with third party curriculum providers and video conferencing platforms to automatically pull engagement data on every student.

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66f8456c64b489d660cbeec8/66f8456d64b489d660cbefd8_check%20White.svg)

**Collect and prepare work samples.**

Scout automatically collects work samples, formats them, and stores them in a compliant and easily-accessible way.

[Watch Video](https://www.scoutforschools.com/#)

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66f8456c64b489d660cbeec8/6798682f979c58d8cc37de96_CleanShot%202025-01-27%20at%2021.14.40@2x.png)

# Stay California compliant.

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66f8456c64b489d660cbeec8/66f8456d64b489d660cbefd8_check%20White.svg)

**Enroll and onboard students with one click.**

No more Google Forms, copying details from a spreadsheet to your SIS, or manual account provisioning in curriculum providers.

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66f8456c64b489d660cbeec8/66f8456d64b489d660cbefd8_check%20White.svg)

**Get required documentation for change requests.**

Whenever a student or parent wants to make a change, Scout reaches out to get the documentation needed.

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66f8456c64b489d660cbeec8/66f8456d64b489d660cbefd8_check%20White.svg)

**Report to CALPADS automatically.**

Scout automatically reports data to CALPADS for every reporting period, handling most errors on its own.

[Watch Video](https://www.scoutforschools.com/#)

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66f8456c64b489d660cbeec8/66f8456d64b489d660cbefd8_check%20White.svg)

**Be prepared for audits.**

Scout stores all auditable information in an easily downloadable format, so California audits are a breeze.

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66f8456c64b489d660cbeec8/6798682fae5242fe32eba2c3_Screenshot%202025-01-27%20at%209.15.12%E2%80%AFPM.png)

# Saved money. Saved time. **Saved headaches.**

### With School Pathways:

# Busywork

# Teaching

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66f8456c64b489d660cbeec8/67956db8f45812ba0d5f3732_pie-chart%20(3).svg)

### With Scout:

# Busywork

# Teaching

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66f8456c64b489d660cbeec8/67956d42650ea7503dfd403b_pie-chart%20(2).svg)

### **Schools using Scout can automate up to 60% of their busywork, freeing up more time for teaching.**

Built for california independent study

## The only SIS built specifically for you.

California independent study schools have to deal with neverending paperwork, compliance, and reporting. Your SIS should help you with that, without charging you an arm and a leg for every mundane request.

With Scout, you can be confident that your school is compliant, so you can focus on what matters.

[Book a demo](https://calendly.com/noah-teachwithscout)

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66f8456c64b489d660cbeec8/6785f8ad671f272a97b2f45c_image%20(1).png)

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66f8456c64b489d660cbeec8/66f85628b5cc23c2b7077bb3_pexels-max-fischer-5212695.jpg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66f8456c64b489d660cbeec8/66f8562737d8e0032ded288a_pexels-divinetechygirl-1181487.jpg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66f8456c64b489d660cbeec8/66f8562737d8e0032ded2764_pexels-pixabay-256395.jpg)

### Best-in-class data security.

Protecting your school’s sensitive information is our top priority. Scout employs advanced encryption protocols, multi-factor authentication, and regular security updates to ensure your data is always secure. We comply with all federal and state regulations, including FERPA, COPPA, and California's data requirements (SOPIPA), to safeguard student records and personal information. With real-time monitoring and automated backups, you can trust that your school’s data is protected against threats, breaches, and data loss.

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66f8456c64b489d660cbeec8/6711de20607c3893600de2e2_sec3.png)

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66f8456c64b489d660cbeec8/6711de200284b44bb4b2f1fd_sec4.png)

### Compatible with more than 50 platforms.

Scout is compatible with more than 50 of the world's leading online learning platforms, and we're continuously adding more integrations.

If there's a platform your school or district uses that isn't already covered, Scout's proprietary secure AI technology means we can add a new integration in days, not months.

### World-class support, wherever you are.

Our commitment to your success doesn’t end at implementation. As a Scout client, you'll get access to our executive team in whatever medium you use for communication: Teams, Slack, email, WhatsApp, you name it. Say goodbye to waiting for a request to be escalated 10 times over the course of a year, and say hello to 15 minute response times from our founders.

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66f8456c64b489d660cbeec8/6711de2088cf85438ad4495b_sec5.png)

## Made with love in San Francisco.

With over 15 years of experience building software, Scout is backed by a team you can trust. We build software with independent study schools, for independent study schools.

[Book a Demo](https://calendly.com/noah-teachwithscout)

Join Our Newsletter

We’ll send you a short update once per week. No spam.

We care about the security of your data.

See our [privacy policy](https://www.scoutforschools.com/privacy-policy) and [terms of service](https://www.scoutforschools.com/terms).

### About us

At Scout, we’re committed to revolutionizing school management by providing educators with the tools they deserve to run their schools in the 21st century.

Name: Trace
Headline: Voice AI Customer Support for Financial Services
Description:
We started Trace because we believe AI should wow customers, not frustrate them. As a result, we prioritize reliability and seamless customer interactions. 

Trace AI agents resolve calls end-to-end, securely integrating with bank systems and external APIs. So far, our agents handle quoting, application, and transaction tracking calls for our partners — but we’re still searching for new exciting use cases.

Question to all fintechs/banks: Which customer requests keep coming back to you? We’d love to learn how you handle them now and if they are ripe for automation.
Founder1_Description: Saner (CEO @ Trace) has a remarkable track record of building reliable AI solutions for high-stakes applications. While studying Electrical Engineering and CS at UC Berkeley, he contributed to multiple publications in robot learning and computer vision at BAIR Lab. Before Trace, Saner co-built an AI copilot for surgeons that helped save lives during cardiothoracic surgeries at UCSF.
Founder2_Description: Kayla (COO @ Trace) did her bachelor’s and master’s in CS at UC Berkeley, where she led groundbreaking NLP research under Professor Dan Klein. Before Trace, Kayla co-built an AI copilot for surgeons that helped save lives during cardiothoracic surgeries at UCSF. Kayla was also a national-level athlete in fencing and lacrosse — her unwavering perseverance and laser focus have become core values of Trace.
Founder3_Description: Yash (CTO @ Trace) studied Math and CS at UC Berkeley and Stanford (MS). Before Trace, he worked as a Quant Researcher at Optiver and Goldman Sachs, where he enabled millions of dollars in annual profitability through his high-frequency trading strategies. He also contributed to ML research published by Stanford, Berkeley, and the US Department of Energy (LBNL).

# Trace 📞 - AI Customer Support Agents for Banks and Fintechs
We believe AI should wow customers with instant resolution, not frustrate them.
**Saner Cakir**
[Trace](https://www.ycombinator.com/launches/</companies/trace>)
13 days ago
[ ](https://www.ycombinator.com/launches/<https:/twitter.com/intent/tweet?text=Trace+just+launched+on+%40ycombinator%27s+Launch+YC%21%0A%0ATrace+%F0%9F%93%9E+-+AI+Customer+Support+Agents+for+Banks+and+Fintechs.+Check+them+out%3A&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.ycombinator.com%2Flaunches%2FMkY-trace-ai-customer-support-agents-for-banks-and-fintechs>)
Embed
<http://tracetec.co>
#b2b#saas#finance#artificial_intelligence
Hey! Saner, Yash, and Kayla from Trace here.
**TL;DR** : Trace ([tracetec.co](https://www.ycombinator.com/launches/<http:/tracetec.co/>)) builds voice AI agents to handle customer support for fintechs and banks. Beyond answering generic questions, our AI agents can actually take actions like "replace my card" or "dispute this charge" while maintaining human-like conversation.
[Here is a quick demo](https://www.ycombinator.com/launches/<https:/youtu.be/Yh8fIzbHLK4>)
# **Problem**
Customer service is one of the largest operational spends across banks (15% opex), insurance (40% opex), and fintechs. However, call centers offer inconsistent service quality despite the cost.
Existing AI solutions only read off of public documents and deflect the user — they can’t access account-specific data or take actions like human agents would. In financial services, this causes extreme user frustration.
# **Solution**
Trace AI agents securely integrate with core systems to offer instant, 24/7 resolution over the phone. So far, we achieve 95% end-to-end resolution of calls across quoting, card applications, transaction tracking, and more — all while following policy and never leaking sensitive data. With under 0.2s time to first token, we are also optimized for seamless interactions over voice.
![](https://www.ycombinator.com/media/?type=post&id=87454&key=user_uploads/979984/a9a81a23-a002-462e-a26d-7c84f1d1384b)
# **Team**
We are all ex Stanford/Berkeley researchers, specialized in building reliable AI solutions for high-stakes applications. [Saner](https://www.ycombinator.com/launches/<https:/www.linkedin.com/in/saner-cakir-697385300/>) (CEO) built an AI copilot that helped UCSF cardiothoracic surgeons save real lives. [Yash](https://www.ycombinator.com/launches/<https:/www.linkedin.com/in/yashvpansari/>) (CTO) was a quant researcher at Optiver and Goldman Sachs, where he enabled millions in annual profitability with his high frequency trading strategies. [Kayla](https://www.ycombinator.com/launches/<https:/www.linkedin.com/in/kayla-lee-715149160/>) (COO) led a project at the Berkeley NLP Group that laid the foundation for Trace’s tech.
# **Ask**
If you know any decision-makers at:
  * fintechs
  * banks
  * insurance providers
  * BPOs,


please contact founders@tracetec.co — we’d love to get their perspective!

Onlook is the open source Cursor for Designers – Making it easy for anyone to design directly in a live website and instantly write their changes in code.

Onlook is the best way for designers, non-technical team members, and developers to collaborate, empowering teams to create incredible products and websites incredibly fast.

Founded by Daniel Farrell, a designer of 10+ years and former Head of Growth, and Kiet Ho, an ex-Amazon and ex-ServiceNow engineer, Onlook is on a mission to finally solve the gap between design and development.

# Onlook – Cursor for Designers
An open-source, visual editor that makes it easy for designers and developers to collaborate in code.
**Daniel Farrell**
[Onlook](https://www.ycombinator.com/launches/</companies/onlook>)
12 days ago
[ ](https://www.ycombinator.com/launches/<https:/twitter.com/intent/tweet?text=Onlook+just+launched+on+%40ycombinator%27s+Launch+YC%21%0A%0AOnlook+%E2%80%93+Cursor+for+Designers.+Check+them+out%3A&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.ycombinator.com%2Flaunches%2FMkl-onlook-cursor-for-designers>)
Embed
<https://onlook.com/>
#ai#design#open_source#design_tools#developer_tools
**TL;DR –**[**Onlook**](https://www.ycombinator.com/launches/<http:/onlook.com/?utm_source=launch_yc&utm_medium=social&utm_campaign=yc_launch>)** is building the Cursor for designers, making it easy for designers and developers to collaborate in code. Onlook’s open-source visual editor was the **[**#1 trending repo**](https://www.ycombinator.com/launches/<https:/github.com/onlook-dev/onlook/>)** on GitHub, and has over 6.8k stars.**
➡️ [Try Onlook today](https://www.ycombinator.com/launches/<http:/onlook.com/download?utm_source=launch_yc&utm_medium=social&utm_campaign=yc_launch>) ⬅️
Here’s a [sneak peak of what it’s like to design with Onlook.](https://www.ycombinator.com/launches/<https:/www.youtube.com/watch?v=wDity8UrIxE>)
Hey there, we’re Daniel and Kiet, and we’re building Onlook ([onlook.com](https://www.ycombinator.com/launches/<http:/onlook.com/?utm_source=launch_yc&utm_medium=social&utm_campaign=yc_launch>)), the Cursor for Designers.
### **The Problem**
There have been many attempts at solving the problem of design to dev handoff. But for so many tools in the market, there was always compromise. Either the tools were too complex for designers or too cumbersome for engineers to implement.
They were all built to abstract away code, but we’re in a new era of product development—where code isn’t the barrier. The real challenge is giving builders the best way to work with it. In other words, creating things with code has become more of a UX problem than a technical one.
### **Our Solution**
![](https://www.ycombinator.com/media/?type=post&id=87467&key=user_uploads/137575/f4e651b1-8cc2-4f41-8512-09500cf2cd0d)
Our product can be best described as a visual IDE – you can either start with building a new app from a prompt, or import your existing NextJS / Tailwind app with Onlook. Once you run your app, you can start designing the interface directly as it’s rendered.
![](https://www.ycombinator.com/media/?type=post&id=87467&key=user_uploads/137575/7a85a948-73c8-418f-9420-155cdec6d2de)
Want to change a color? Want to move a div? Want to create a new page? You can do it yourself, or ask Onlook’s AI chat to do it for you. Because everything is one-to-one in code, you’re creating the real product with your edits, and you can always right-click to view your code in your preferred code editor.
And, when you’re ready to share your creation with the world, you can host your project through Onlook with just a click.
### **How we got here**
We started Onlook because we had experienced both sides of the design / engineering gap. Daniel has been a designer for over a decade, and Kiet was an engineer at ServiceNow and Amazon working directly with designers.
Kiet reached out to Daniel on YC’s Cofounder matching platform after starting the company in January of 2024, and shortly after we decided to team up and work together. If you’re looking for a cofounder, we [wrote a bit](https://www.ycombinator.com/launches/<https:/onlook.substack.com/p/how-to-find-a-cofounder>) about that process that you may find useful on our company Substack.
We [launched on Hacker News](https://www.ycombinator.com/launches/<https:/news.ycombinator.com/item?id=40904862>) and the project quickly earned over 1k GitHub stars. People were compelled by the idea of an open-source visual editor for code, and it felt like the timing was right. Since launching, we’ve continued to refine our editor to make it even better, and have since earned **6.8k stars** , tons of contributions.
Also, Onlook was recently ranked as the **#1 trending repo on GitHub**!
![](https://www.ycombinator.com/media/?type=post&id=87467&key=user_uploads/137575/79a6fb56-14c8-4c1e-b815-9261e651199a)
### **Use Onlook**
You can get started today by [downloading Onlook](https://www.ycombinator.com/launches/<http:/onlook.com/download?utm_source=launch_yc&utm_medium=social&utm_campaign=yc_launch>).
People use Onlook for **prototyping ideas** , for **building their product** , and for **hosting their website**. Thanks to [Paratus Health](https://www.ycombinator.com/launches/<https:/paratushealth.com/>), [SalesPatriot](https://www.ycombinator.com/launches/<https:/salespatriot.com/>), [Calltree.ai](https://www.ycombinator.com/launches/<http:/Calltree.ai>), [NextByte](https://www.ycombinator.com/launches/<https:/trynextbyte.com/>), [Casixty](https://www.ycombinator.com/launches/<https:/casixty.com/>), [TrainLoop](https://www.ycombinator.com/launches/<https:/trainloop.ai/>), and [Scout](https://www.ycombinator.com/launches/<https:/www.scoutforschools.com/>) for being early partners and for using Onlook to build their sites and products!
### **Asks**
  * **Try Onlook** out and reach out to us with your feedback and questions. We love when people send us screen recordings, written feedback, and ideas. Email Daniel – daniel@onlook.com.
  * **Contribute** – Help us build the future of design and development tools! We have an active community of contributors from all over the world, and working on a design editor is very fun. Feel free to [browse our open issues and contribute](https://www.ycombinator.com/launches/<https:/github.com/onlook-dev/onlook/issues>), or [support the project with a star](https://www.ycombinator.com/launches/<https:/github.com/onlook-dev/onlook/>)! ⭐
  * **Follow us** – We put out a lot of content in a lot of places: 
    * Join our [Discord community](https://www.ycombinator.com/launches/<https:/discord.gg/ZZzadNQtns>)
    * Follow [Onlook on X](https://www.ycombinator.com/launches/<https:/x.com/onlookdev>)
    * Follow [Onlook on LinkedIn](https://www.ycombinator.com/launches/<https:/www.linkedin.com/company/onlook-dev/>)
    * Subscribe to [Onlook on YouTube](https://www.ycombinator.com/launches/<https:/www.youtube.com/@OnlookDev>)
    * Subscribe to [Onlook on Substack](https://www.ycombinator.com/launches/<https:/onlook.substack.com/>) – we like sharing our learnings of building a company in detail here


Onlook is building **the uncompromising design and development tool** – One familiar to designers and infused with AI to make excellent code that developers love.
With Onlook, we hope to empower anyone to make incredible websites, incredibly fast, and we can’t wait to see what you create!
### **About Us**
![](https://www.ycombinator.com/media/?type=post&id=87467&key=user_uploads/137575/a2562297-969e-420b-b563-adea12dea8be)
Onlook is founded by Daniel Farrell ([LinkedIn](https://www.ycombinator.com/launches/<https:/www.linkedin.com/in/danielrfarrell/>)), a designer with a decade of design consulting experience, a first 100 Bird employee, and former Head of Growth at DIMO, and Kiet Ho ([LinkedIn](https://www.ycombinator.com/launches/<https:/www.linkedin.com/in/kiet-ho/>)), a former engineer at Amazon and ServiceNow.

# Osmosis: Unlocking Real-Time Learning for AI Agents
Osmosis gives AI agents the ability to learn like DeepSeek R1, all in real-time 
**Kasey Zhang**
[Gulp](https://www.ycombinator.com/launches/</companies/gulp>)
12 days ago
[ ](https://www.ycombinator.com/launches/<https:/twitter.com/intent/tweet?text=Gulp+just+launched+on+%40ycombinator%27s+Launch+YC%21%0A%0AOsmosis%3A+Unlocking+Real-Time+Learning+for+AI+Agents.+Check+them+out%3A&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.ycombinator.com%2Flaunches%2FMkt-osmosis-unlocking-real-time-learning-for-ai-agents>)
Embed
<https://gulp.ai/>
#ai#big_data#infrastructure#developer_tools#data_engineering
What if AI agents could immediately learn from their mistakes?
## TL;DR
While AI agent capabilities continue to improve, the agentic workflows remain brittle since agents aren’t able to learn from tasks in real-time. Osmosis is a framework that helps your AI agents learn in real-time (similar to DeepSeek R1’s post-training loop) in order to make them better, faster, and more responsive.
On the first run, we scored 21.5% accuracy, which is 60% better than base 4o performance (16X more expensive!). **This means that even on a first run, we're 25X+ more cost effective than base 4o - and that would be significantly better on a second run.** We also averaged 7.5 steps per task while OpenAI Operator averaged 67 steps per task (faster and cheaper!).
If you’re building AI agents and want to make them better, faster, and more responsive, we’d love to chat! Email kasey@gulp.ai or book time [here](https://www.ycombinator.com/launches/<https:/calendly.com/kasey-gulp/>).
## The Problem
AI agents still struggle with novel and complex (multi-step) tasks. Even OpenAI Operator (current state-of-the-art) just scores 58% accuracy on the WebArena benchmark. The worst part is that agents make the same mistakes again and again!
And even when agents can solve a task, there’s generally a lack of optimization in their process. This ends up negatively affecting performance while also driving up inefficient inference costs for users.
## The Solution
Osmosis builds and maintains a ‘library’ of an agent’s previous interactions. It’s a super simple two line addition in a developer’s agent infrastructure that:
  * Ingests and understand a user’s prompt
  * Queries a vector database to search for similar past scenarios
  * Recommends a relevant plan of action for the task
  * Quantifies an agent’s performance when it finishes, and embeds the assessment


Just like that, we have a flow that enables agents to learn in real-time with each successive task!
Here’s a head-to-head (Operator versus Claude 3.5 Sonnet + Osmosis):
<https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uhFuT8VD9tk>
**Osmosis was 3X faster and 6X more efficient in the number of steps taken!**
## Our Ask
If you (or anyone you know) are building AI agents and struggling with accuracy, speed, or cost, we’d love to chat and see how we can help! Please reach out at kasey@gulp.ai, or book some time directly [here](https://www.ycombinator.com/launches/<https:/calendly.com/kasey-gulp/>).
## The Team
We’ve (Kasey and Andy) known each other for over a decade!
[Kasey](https://www.ycombinator.com/launches/<https:/www.linkedin.com/in/kasey-zhang/>) (CEO) previously co-founded and ran a gaming startup for two years before it was acquired. From there, he worked at various VC firms focusing on AI and data investments before deciding to jump back into building.
[Andy](https://www.ycombinator.com/launches/<https:/www.linkedin.com/in/baiqingl/>) (CTO) previously worked at TikTok, where he joined as an early member of the data infrastructure team and eventually became a tech lead, running data infrastructure for recommendations across the core TikTok app, Shop, Live, and more.
![](https://www.ycombinator.com/media/?type=post&id=87475&key=user_uploads/695591/d662049a-cf42-4d21-bc5f-08643fd3be5e)
[See All Launches ›](https://www.ycombinator.com/launches/</launches>)
## Footer
[Y Combinator![Y Combinator](https://www.ycombinator.com/launches/Mkt-osmosis-unlocking-real-time-learning-for-ai-agents)](https://www.ycombinator.com/launches/</> "Y Combinator")

Name: Cenote
Headline: Automate back office tasks for medical clinics
Description:
Cenote uses AI to automate the back office for medical practices — eliminating the bottlenecks that often delay patient care and clinic revenue.

Typically, practices hire teams to manually extract patient info from hundreds to thousands of faxes a week. This slow process risks losing patients to faster competitors. Cenote’s software streamlines this workflow. 

Between the 50 million specialist outpatient visits and 40 million specialty drug prescriptions annually, Cenote accelerates access to a $90 billion market.

The team behind Cenote—Kofi, Ajani, and Kristy—met in San Francisco and bring deep expertise in building scalable solutions for highly-regulated industries such as climate and gov tech.
Tags: industry:robotic-process-automation; industry:health-tech; industry:b2b; industry:healthcare; industry:ai; location:san-francisco-bay-area
Founder1_Description:
I am the co-founder and CEO of Cenote. I graduated with a degree in computer science and worked for three years at Promise, a YC company in the gov-tech industry, so I have experience building in heavily regulated industries. 
Outside of work, you’ll often find me on a run or perfecting my refried bean paste recipe. :)
Founder2_Description: Hi! I'm the CTO of Cenote. I studied Computer Science at UWaterloo. Before YC I was a software engineer at Watershed, a carbon accounting startup. I've also worked at huge companies like Google and PayPal and also teeny tiny startups. When I'm not working I'm running, surfing, painting, roller blading, and trying to balance my 1001 different hobbies.
Founder3_Description: Before Cenote he spent the last 3 years as an early stage VC at Base10, investing $30M in seed and series A stage companies. Ajani graduated from Howard University with degrees in Physics and Economics.

# Cenote - Back office automation for specialist medical clinics
Cenote eliminates administrative bottlenecks that slow down revenue.
**Kofi Ansong**
[Cenote](https://www.ycombinator.com/launches/</companies/cenote>)
12 days ago
[ ](https://www.ycombinator.com/launches/<https:/twitter.com/intent/tweet?text=Cenote+just+launched+on+%40ycombinator%27s+Launch+YC%21%0A%0ACenote+-+Back+office+automation+for+specialist+medical+clinics.+Check+them+out%3A&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.ycombinator.com%2Flaunches%2FMky-cenote-back-office-automation-for-specialist-medical-clinics>)
Embed
<https://www.joincenote.com/>
#ai#b2b#healthcare#health_tech#robotic_process_automation
### **tl;dr**
We work with specialist clinics to identify their biggest administrative blockers and deploy custom **AI** to resolve them. Right now, we’re automating **referral intake** , reducing the time it takes for clinics to process new patients and accelerate revenue collection.
<https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=u403AnLMSNE>
### **Problem**
Specialist clinics struggle with **slow, manual referral processing** , leading to revenue delays, administrative overload, and patient drop offs. The biggest bottlenecks we've uncovered:
  * **Referral processing is manual and slow.** Clinics receive **thousands of referrals per month** , requiring extensive manual effort to extract and enter data.
  * **Medical necessity verification is tedious.** Clinics must determine if a referral meets insurance criteria, often requiring **days of back-and-forth with primary care providers** for missing information.
  * **Insurance approvals are a major roadblock.** Clinics waste **days negotiating with insurers** to confirm reimbursement eligibility before scheduling treatment.


These inefficiencies cause **40-60% of referrals to drop off and** costs the U.S. healthcare system **over $150 billion annually**. The administrative burden is also immense, with an average of **4.3 administrative staff per doctor** in the American healthcare system.
### **Solution**
![](https://lh7-rt.googleusercontent.com/docsz/AD_4nXduwoVo9LiyuYd4ldqDHoJxHu2uaKzKbOzQnI4MZ0vlWDvKTY-nE2iokzaFTCR7-7PeqhwdI9FIqtRbpP1FkZ3ivWq6TdtuyftWnKoMCyzw-smhtrM7tZacSCTnDkJ45wF92PRK7w?key=9LANEIwzbMw6NQWGiMH6ii1e)
Cenote eliminates the **referral-to-treatment bottleneck** , allowing clinics to focus on patient care while accelerating revenue collection.
  * **Automated data extraction:** We categorize and extract key referral details the moment they hit the clinic’s inbox.
  * **Seamless medical necessity verification:** If critical referral data is missing, our system **auto-requests** the necessary information via the preferred form of digital communication.
  * **AI-powered insurance authorization:** Our **AI callers** handle insurance approvals, freeing clinic staff to focus on higher-value tasks.


![](https://lh7-rt.googleusercontent.com/docsz/AD_4nXeGgHkFuty55KGO5k--WHuaGP852o6tN4i7BepjytmDTjp48gCAx7ZC2boYhxw4NV9-evAIo09IUWh61gICroHpapc2X2jAmN3plFp4tpHM7ib9RKHwuqyyvd4FXxx2qQe-r7D7Uw?key=9LANEIwzbMw6NQWGiMH6ii1e)
Validate page allows staff to easily confirm extracted data
### **Team**
![](https://www.ycombinator.com/media/?type=post&id=87480&key=user_uploads/2213671/4398c4d4-4712-4460-a3a3-46107d03750d)
[Kofi](https://www.ycombinator.com/launches/<https:/www.linkedin.com/in/kofi-ansong-89294016a/>) was formerly a software engineer for [Promise](https://www.ycombinator.com/launches/<https:/www.ycombinator.com/companies/promise>) (YC W18), a gov-tech company. He is leveraging his experience building AI products for state governments to delight folks in the healthcare industry.
[Ajani](https://www.ycombinator.com/launches/<https:/www.linkedin.com/in/ajani-smith-washington/>) spent 2.5 years before this as an early stage VC at Base10 -- investing $30M in seed and series A stage companies
[Kristy](https://www.ycombinator.com/launches/<https:/www.linkedin.com/in/gaoxk/>) worked on carbon accounting engines at Watershed Climate and is experienced in working in highly regulated spaces. She developed a wide set of engineering expertise from her time at several tech companies, including Google, PayPal, Cockroach Labs.
### **ASK**
If you know someone who owns or works at a specialist medical practice (e.g. sleep centers, specialty pharmacies, medical supply store), please introduce us. You can reach us at founders@joincenote.com.

Name: FuseAI
Headline: The world's first Customer General Intelligence platform.
Description: We're building a new agentic operating system to enable enterprises to automate their entire go-to-market (GTM) organizations with vertical AI agents. You can think of the platform as Salesforce meets OpenAI Operator, specifically for GTM teams. We enable you to run your entire sales deal cycle through a simple AI-powered conversational interface, built on-top of an E2E product suite - use natural language to manage customer relationships, enrich B2B contacts, find high-intent leads, and engage with clients in seconds.
Tags: industry:artificial-intelligence; industry:saas; industry:b2b; industry:sales; industry:operations; location:san-francisco-bay-area
Founder1_Description: Co-founder and CEO at FuseAI, based out of San Francisco. Saurav is a seasoned operator, most recently supporting Deel's hyper-growth from $50M > $600M+ ARR on the GTM Strategy & Operations team. He graduated from the Richard Ivey School of Business with a B.A. in Honors Business Administration. In his spare time, he enjoys playing golf (scratch), piano, and is an avid F1 fan.
Founder2_Description: At 17, Imogen joined SAP’s Innovation team as a MLE after teaching herself to code and earning international recognition for her indoor navigation app. She later led NLP and ML initiatives across Asia Pacific at SAP before co-founding NWO.ai in New York at 21. As CTO, she helped build a pioneering platform that analyzes unstructured data to forecast global consumer trends, securing enterprise clients like LVMH, L'Oréal, P&G, and Colgate. Later, NWO.ai was acquired by Growth Protocol.

# Scale revenue with your personal AI Agent.

Find out exactly who visited your website, then plug in to our live database connected to 10+ data vendors to convert your most valuable buyers in seconds.

\|

[Try AI Search\\
\\
![RightArrowIcon](https://tryfuse.ai/static/media/mainArrow.68db6c2c18e0faf7062be703f1150717.svg)\\
\\
![RightArrowIcon](https://tryfuse.ai/static/media/mainArrow.68db6c2c18e0faf7062be703f1150717.svg)](https://tryfuse.ai/#getInTouch)

![LandingStaticSvg](https://tryfuse.ai/static/media/fuse-hero-new.51557143d5403c65a030.png)

## WHAT WE DO

We enable you to run your entire sales deal cycle through a simple conversational interface, built on-top of an end-to-end product suite; use natural language to manage customer relationships, enrich B2B contacts, find high-intent leads, and engage with clients in seconds.

## WHAT WE OFFER

Fuse AI empowers your entire GTM team

# Conversational CRM Interface

Ask our Fuse Agent any command imaginable to simplify your workflow. Learning more about a customer or company? Validating B2B emails? Sending emails at scale? Simply ask and you will receive in seconds.

# Live B2B Contact & Account Database

We've created the world's first “live” database that plugs into 10+ data sources to provided you with real-time, fresh, and accurate data.

# Engagement on autopilot

Fully automated outreach from the first message all the way up-to booking a demos in your calendar, enabling your top performers to focus on closing deals in a demo.

# Buyer Intent Signals

Our platform plugs directly into your website to denanonymize website traffic, so your sales and marketing professionals have real-time data on who to prospect.

## MANIFESTO

Every company requires customers. Without customers, sales simply can't happen. Nowadays go-to-market teams struggle with manual tasks, disconnected tools, and fragmented data due to the archaic software they are operating on. This chaotic approach to go-to-market makes it increasingly challenging to manage and generate leads that convert into high quality customers.

FuseAI isn’t just another sales software tool. We're building the next-gen operating system for revenue teams. We're not claiming to replace your SDRs with terrible email automations or providing you false promises of 100xing your revenue. Our focus is on human amplification - our mission is simple, let's make the best companies and sales professionals 5X better and build a platform that everyone actually enjoys using. We're building for user experience and productivity so your best reps can close 5M in deals annually vs. the traditional 1M target for most companies.

Here a few of the many pain-points we're tackling head on: What if businesses didn't have to spend 6 months evaluating multiple vendors to setup their sales tech stacks? What if they always had access to real-time B2B contact and account data? What if emails never bounced? What if they always knew who their high-intent leads where? What if they didn't have to toggle across several different software tools during the day? What if “Salesforce hygiene” wasn't their number one priority and it was self-updating? What if companies didn't need to spend millions on technical systems architects, and software was actually simple to use, instead of an expensive headache? What if their CRMs automatically recorded, analyzed, and integrated sales call recordings?

Our category defining software is making functionalities such as Real-time B2B Contact and Account Data, Customer Intent, and Multi-Channel Engagement out-of-the-box features within CRM. We're building simplified agentic workflows to re-imagine traditional manual workflows, so you can focus on closing deals.

It's amazing how Salesforce, a $300B empire, has largely grown due to path dependence, with 90% of users dreading to use it daily. We're at the beginning of a techno-paradigm shift with agentic software leading the charge. So here we are, with a bold vision and a relentless drive to make it a reality. We're still writing the story of FuseAI, and I couldn't be prouder of how far we've come—or more excited about where we're going.

If you're reading this, you're already part of the journey. Let's change the game, together.

## Sincerely,    FuseAI Team

Name: Artifact
Headline: A modern workspace for electrical design
Description: Artifact is a 2D electrical system CAD tool leveraging AI to automate tedious, error-prone tasks: datasheet ingestion, multi-fidelity system design, and manufacturing documentation
Founder1_Description: Corbin Klett is an aerospace engineering PhD from Georgia Tech, where he applied cutting-edge control theory research to robotic systems. After spending a couple of years in industry working on design and embedded software for a high-speed aircraft prototype, he cofounded Artifact. The team’s current focus is on building software tools that accelerate hardware engineering workflows, specifically in the area of electrical and avionics systems design.
Founder2_Description: Antony Samuel is an electrical engineer with eight years of experience developing avionics and software for complex aerospace systems. Most recently, he was the Avionics Lead at Hermeus, where he built the team and infrastructure behind the avionics for the world’s fastest aircraft (Mach 5). Now, as co-founder of Artifact, Antony is building next-generation design tools to accelerate hardware engineering, with a focus on avionics and electrical system design.

# Artifact - A modern workspace for electrical design
We're building CAD software for electrical system design
**Antony Samuel**
[Artifact](https://www.ycombinator.com/launches/</companies/artifact-2>)
14 days ago

#b2b#hardware#aerospace#design_tools#developer_tools
We’re Antony and Corbin - cofounders of [Artifact](https://www.ycombinator.com/launches/<https:/www.artifact.engineer/>)!
In our past life, we built custom Mach 5 jet engines together - with the electrical designs living on iPhone pictures of whiteboards. We’re here to _finally_ bring electrical design tools to the modern age
**The ask:** if you’re a hardware engineer building complex electrical systems, email us at antony@artifact.engineer or [schedule a demo](https://www.ycombinator.com/launches/<https:/calendly.com/antony-artifact/20min>)!
[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dvljACPVPLQ&ab_channel=Artifact](https://www.ycombinator.com/launches/<https:/www.youtube.com/watch?v=dvljACPVPLQ&ab_channel=Artifact>)
# **THE PROBLEM:**
**Electrical system design tools have lagged behind modern-day needs:**
  1. Manually reading datasheets takes too long and is error-prone
  2. Visio, [draw.io](https://www.ycombinator.com/launches/<http:/draw.io>), or Excel don’t have built-in electrical capability
  3. Linking low and high-fidelity designs is manual and error-prone
  4. Manufacturing drawings are manually drawn and fall out of sync


# **THE SOLUTION:**
**We’re building a single-source-of-truth electrical tool with AI hooks:**
  1. Use our AI datasheet parser to generate pinouts
  2. Embed electrical capabilities (e.g. parts libraries & design checks)
  3. Link Low-fidelity block diagrams and high-fidelity details
  4. Autogenerate manufacturing drawings from system definition


![](https://www.tella.tv/api/stories/cm6pp3qgg000f0albb2wggcvs/thumb.gif?version=2025-02-03T23:51:06.063Z&resolution=1280x720&inpoint=0)
![](https://www.tella.tv/api/stories/cm6ppk7ol00050aju8juk1tia/thumb.gif?version=2025-02-03T23:55:08.369Z&resolution=1280x720&inpoint=0)
# **OUR TEAM:**
**We built jet engines together - now we’re building tools we wish we had**
![](https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/v2/D4E22AQHTwK48z-Lt3w/feedshare-shrink_2048_1536/B4EZSHiAHvGYAs-/0/1737440631222?e=1741824000&v=beta&t=bRT80ya2jyp2sNJ7FWgvyVNTFeYXI-ZojpxzyEkOOCw)
[Antony Samuel (CEO)](https://www.ycombinator.com/launches/<https:/www.linkedin.com/in/antony-samuel/>) is an electrical engineer who has spent eight years developing avionics and software for complex aerospace systems. Most recently, he was the Avionics Lead at Hermeus, where he built the team and infrastructure behind the avionics for the world’s fastest aircraft.
[Corbin Klett (CTO)](https://www.ycombinator.com/launches/<https:/www.linkedin.com/in/corbinklett/>) is an aerospace engineering PhD from Georgia Tech, where he applied control theory research to robotic systems. After building embedded software for a high-speed aircraft prototype, he cofounded Artifact to build software to accelerate hardware engineering workflows.
**Watch a more detailed technical demo here:**
<https://www.tella.tv/video/cm6pmvpo6000c0bju7wkndp7c/view>
![](https://www.ycombinator.com/media/?type=post&id=87430&key=user_uploads/2436016/73ae0568-6787-47a8-b086-db0bef921741)

# Pave Robotics - Robots that repair roads
Meet Tracer, the world's first fully autonomous crack sealing robot.
**Josh Kelly**
[Pave Robotics](https://www.ycombinator.com/launches/</companies/pave-robotics>)
7 days ago
[ ](https://www.ycombinator.com/launches/<https:/twitter.com/intent/tweet?text=Pave+Robotics+just+launched+on+%40ycombinator%27s+Launch+YC%21%0A%0APave+Robotics+-+Robots+that+repair+roads.+Check+them+out%3A&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.ycombinator.com%2Flaunches%2FMmN-pave-robotics-robots-that-repair-roads>)
Embed
<https://pave-robotics.com>
#hardware#construction#self-driving_vehicles
# **TL;DR**
[Pave Robotics](https://www.ycombinator.com/launches/<https:/pave-robotics.com>) builds robots that seal cracks in asphalt, making road repair cheaper and easier. Our robots work 24/7 and deliver higher-quality results than humans.
![](https://www.ycombinator.com/media/?type=post&id=87567&key=user_uploads/1490740/f65f62fa-f633-4d9a-8faf-f349f7c0eaec)
# **The Problem**
America’s roads are in crisis. 42% are in mediocre or poor condition, despite $27 billion being spent annually on maintenance. The process of fixing these roads is slow, expensive, and increasingly difficult due to an aging workforce and labor shortages. Moreover, extended road closures for repairs are dangerous and cause major traffic disruptions.
# **The Solution**
Meet Tracer, a fully autonomous robot that performs asphalt crack sealing faster and more effectively than a crew of six people. Tracer operates 24/7, helping paving companies increase efficiency, reduce costs, and minimize road closures.
![](https://www.ycombinator.com/media/?type=post&id=87567&key=user_uploads/1490740/0ea5436e-38dd-4f2b-aeb4-3a3932416ef0)
# **Why start with cracks?**
Crack sealing is the first line of defense against bad roads, but we plan to expand into other forms of road maintenance and paving in the future. We envision a future where roads are continuously kept in pristine condition—and we're building the robots to make that possible.
# **Our ask**
If you know anyone in the following categories we would love an introduction! Email us at founders@pave-robotics.com
  * Paving companies
  * State or local departments of transportation
  * State or local public works departments
  * Private equity firms buying paving companies
  * Large private parking lot or road owners


# **Team**
[Josh Kelly](https://www.ycombinator.com/launches/<https:/www.linkedin.com/in/joshak18/>) and [Mason Landon Smith](https://www.ycombinator.com/launches/<https:/www.linkedin.com/in/mason-landon-smith/>) met while working for the YouTuber [Mark Rober](https://www.ycombinator.com/launches/<https:/www.youtube.com/channel/UCY1kMZp36IQSyNx_9h4mpCg>). Josh led the YouTube team as head of engineering, while Mason was the founding product designer for Crunch Labs.
Josh is a Stanford graduate with a background in Mechatronics at companies like Zipline and NASA JPL. Mason graduated from the Rhode Island School of Design and has a strong track record of building successful products and teams that have gone to market and won multiple awards.
Together, they created Pave Robotics, with the goal of revolutionizing the way roads are maintained.
![](https://www.ycombinator.com/media/?type=post&id=87567&key=user_uploads/1490740/2b6d6580-1bcd-4f5b-922e-97d27f3ff299)

Name: AthenaHQ
Headline: Get Your Brand Discovered on ChatGPT.
Description:
Make sure your brand doesn't get left behind by the paradigm shift from traditional search to generative search.

AthenaHQ helps your brand get discovered on generative engines like ChatGPT, Perplexity, Claude, Gemini, and more.

Generative engine search is expected to overtake traditional search in the next 3 years. Currently, there is no de facto solution for managing a brand's perception on these generative engines. We are building AthenaHQ to fill that gap.

Team of former product manager on Google Search's information acquisition team, Deepmind Generative Media team, and ChatGPT superusers.
Founder1_Description:
Co-founder AthenaHQ--helping brands get discovered on ChatGPT. Formerly @googlesearch @deepmind @usarmylab @columbia

In previous life, played in the band that inspired the Oscar-winning movie Whiplash.
Founder2_Description: Co-founder & CTO at AthenaHQ

# AthenaHQ: Get Your Brand Discovered on ChatGPT
Monitor and Take Action on Your GEO (Generative Engine Optimization)
**Andrew Yan**
[AthenaHQ](https://www.ycombinator.com/launches/</companies/athenahq>)
6 days ago
[ ](https://www.ycombinator.com/launches/<https:/twitter.com/intent/tweet?text=AthenaHQ+just+launched+on+%40ycombinator%27s+Launch+YC%21%0A%0AAthenaHQ%3A+Get+Your+Brand+Discovered+on+ChatGPT.+Check+them+out%3A&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.ycombinator.com%2Flaunches%2FMnK-athenahq-get-your-brand-discovered-on-chatgpt>)
Embed
<https://www.athenahq.ai>
#ai#analytics#marketing
Hey everyone, we’re Andrew and Alan — co-founders of [AthenaHQ.](https://www.ycombinator.com/launches/<https:/www.athenahq.ai>)
# **TL;DR**
[AthenaHQ](https://www.ycombinator.com/launches/<https:/www.athenahq.ai>) helps companies see how their brand appears on generative engines like ChatGPT, Perplexity, Claude, Gemini, and more. Make sure your company doesn’t get left behind in the paradigm shift from traditional to generative search.
# **The Problem**
In the past, majority of website visits came from traditional Google Search. Now, sites are increasingly getting it from generative engines like ChatGPT.
From our conversations, we found anecdotally that site traffic attributed to generative engines is increasing month-over-month, picking up in the past few months since the launch of ChatGPT Search in October 2024. **Traditional search engine volume is predicted to drop 25% by 2026, and 50% by 2028** , replaced by traffic originating from generative engines like ChatGPT.
<https://youtu.be/7VobRo3EEok>
![](https://www.ycombinator.com/media/?type=post&id=87626&key=user_uploads/556828/f040136e-62e0-4ac2-8ce4-f93fb3620c02)
# **The Solution**
AthenaHQ helps your brand adapt to the fast-changing world of generative engines with our monitoring solution and action center. We give you a 360 degree view of possible ways customers are discovering your brand and centralize actionables you can take in our action center. Our copilot Athena generates first drafts of actions you can take to improve your AI engine posture.
![](https://www.ycombinator.com/media/?type=post&id=87626&key=user_uploads/556828/44929a94-b0df-4f41-a55a-19cf9914cae3)
# **AthenaHQ Team**
![](https://www.ycombinator.com/media/?type=post&id=87626&key=user_uploads/1639890/a716a3fc-e51d-4904-ab9d-79de859d9492)
[Andrew](https://www.ycombinator.com/launches/<https:/www.linkedin.com/in/andrew-yan-200/>) (left) was formerly a product manager on Google Search’s information acquisition team and also worked on the generative media team on Deepmind, where he saw firsthand how brand management is changing in the AI age.
[Alan](https://www.ycombinator.com/launches/<https:/www.linkedin.com/in/alanya0/>) (right) has been at the forefront of consumer and AI since pre-ChatGPT, having donated to OpenAI in 2019 back when it was a nonprofit.
# **Our Ask**
Curious what ChatGPT is saying about your brand? Want to track what queries you do well and how you’re trending?
**Know any marketing friends who don’t want to miss out on this paradigm shift?**
Follow us on [LinkedIn](https://www.ycombinator.com/launches/<https:/www.linkedin.com/company/athena-hq>) and feel free to email us at [andrew@athenahq.ai](https://www.ycombinator.com/launches/<https:/mailto:andrew@athenahq.ai>) or schedule time directly on our website: [athenahq.ai](https://www.ycombinator.com/launches/<http:/athenahq.ai>)

Name: Exin Therapeutics
Headline: Precision genetic therapies targeting neural activity across disorders
Description:
We’re building a precision genetic therapy platform that targets neurological and neuropsychiatric disorders from a circuit-level perspective. Current approaches pursue single-gene fixes that only help small subsets of patients, leaving a multi-million patient population without effective treatment options.

Gene therapy opens the door to precisely modifying brain circuits. The problem is the elevated risk in neuroscience drug discovery. To solve this, we use a pre-clinical screening platform, multiple gene therapy candidates, and ML analytics to develop gene therapies capable of controlling neural activity and addressing neurological conditions such as autism spectrum disorder, epilepsy, and Parkinson’s disease.
Founder1_Description: Experience in interdisciplinary research spanning Physics, Engineering and Neuroscience. DPhil in Physiology, Anatomy, and Genetics, focusing on molecular to systems level brain development and function, complemented by computational biophysical modeling.
Founder2_Description: Neuroscientist with a background in biochemistry and research on gene therapy, pancreatic cancer, and muscle physiology at institutions in Boston, Vienna, and Stockholm. Earned MSc in Neuroscience and PhD in Pharmacology at Oxford Uni, focusing on neurodevelopment and the effects of SSRI anti-depressants on early patterns of neural activity. Used neuroAI models at the Gatsby Unit (UCL) to study serotonin’s role in cognition. Currently developing gene therapies for neurological conditions.
Founder3_Description: Cofounder & COO @ Exin Therapeutics. Worked across analysis levels in bio – from molecules to complex behavior. Previously, I worked on retinal and circadian rhythm disorders, neurodevelopment, and systems and comp neuro, with a small stint in venture. Oxford MSc + PhD (on leave to build Exin).

# Exin Therapeutics: Genetic therapies targeting neural activity
Precise modulation of neural activity across neurological disorders.
**Marko Tvrdic**
[Exin Therapeutics](https://www.ycombinator.com/launches/</companies/exin-therapeutics>)
a month ago
[ ](https://www.ycombinator.com/launches/<https:/twitter.com/intent/tweet?text=Exin+Therapeutics+just+launched+on+%40ycombinator%27s+Launch+YC%21%0A%0AExin+Therapeutics%3A+Genetic+therapies+targeting+neural+activity.+Check+them+out%3A&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.ycombinator.com%2Flaunches%2FMd0-exin-therapeutics-genetic-therapies-targeting-neural-activity>)
Embed
<https://www.exintherapeutics.com/>
#biotech#gene_therapy#therapeutics#neurotechnology
[Exin Therapeutics](https://www.ycombinator.com/launches/<https:/www.exintherapeutics.com/>) is developing genetic therapies targeting neural activity for people suffering from neurological and neuropsychiatric disorders. We are tackling conditions like epilepsy, debilitating symptoms of autism spectrum disorder (ASD), and Parkinson’s disease by focusing on the neural circuitry of the brain.
# **Why is this important?**
Millions of people around the world suffer from neurological disorders. These disorders arise from imbalances in brain activity. Think of it like an orchestra where some instruments are playing too loud while others are too quiet. This “bad music” / neural imbalance—what we call excitatory/inhibitory (E/I) imbalance—is the root cause of many symptoms in these disorders. For example, in epilepsy, overactive circuits lead to seizures, while in ASD, it can cause sensory hypersensitivities - where individuals feel overwhelmed by normal sounds, lights, or touch that most people wouldn't even notice. These dysregulations in neural circuits impact how the brain processes information and responds to the world, leading to the debilitating symptoms we see in these disorders.
# **Our solution**
We’re taking a circuit-level approach to treating brain disorders. Instead of trying to restore missing genes, we’re supplementing already existing genes that we know will be directly changing the neural activity in the brain - in the direction that we want and independently of the genetic background.
![](https://www.ycombinator.com/media/?type=post&id=86986&key=user_uploads/89898/4181e602-6279-4611-9af3-73b0ccfca768)
We are also working on an AI model to streamline our preclinical R&D. Here’s why: developing therapies for the brain is hard. Every candidate needs to be tested for its ability to modulate circuits, and doing that through a traditional drug development preclinical pathway is a slow process. Because of that, we use ML to analyze high-density screening data and prioritize which assets are worth testing further. We use neural activity, behavior, and transcriptomics to train multimodal AI models that identify the drivers of the disease, which are not observable by conventional analytical methods.
![](https://www.ycombinator.com/media/?type=post&id=86986&key=user_uploads/89898/b1ad1c24-a513-4633-83f6-58378d1cb5d8)
Then, we use these models to (1) predict the potential of our therapies to treat particular indications and (2) provide an efficacy readout during our internal experimental testing. This way, we spend our time (and funding) testing the most promising candidates.
# **Our ask**
  1. Intros: If you have contacts in pharma, working on complementary tech, or have ideas for partnerships, we’d love to connect.
  2. We'd love to hear from people who have worked in therapeutics and people with IND-enabling programs or clinical trial design experience.


# **Team**
We are a team of 3 Oxford-educated neuroscientists. [Gabriel](https://www.ycombinator.com/launches/<https:/www.linkedin.com/in/gabriel-ocana-santero-85b41819a/?originalSubdomain=uk>) is a biochemist with a wealth of research experience in neural development, gene therapy, and NeuroAI. He holds a PhD in Pharmacology from Oxford. [Ivan](https://www.ycombinator.com/launches/<https:/www.linkedin.com/in/ilazarte/>) is a physicist by training and has worked in molecular biology, circuit, and systems neuroscience. Ivan’s brother suffers from ASD and Ivan is on a mission to improve the quality of life for patients suffering from debilitating neurological conditions. He holds a PhD in neuroscience from Oxford. [Marko](https://www.ycombinator.com/launches/<https:/www.linkedin.com/in/marko-tvrdic/?originalSubdomain=uk>) has experience with iPSC models, retinal disorders, and circadian and developmental neuroscience. During his PhD, he worked in systems and behavioral neuroscience and holds an MSc from Oxford.
![](https://www.ycombinator.com/media/?type=post&id=86986&key=user_uploads/1960211/5487d1f0-6cbc-4728-af74-a8377516e2d3)
We are supported by a team of advisors from top industry and academic institutions - including Harvard & UCL.

# BlindPay - Stablecoin API for Global Payments
Core Infrastructure for LatAm Payments
**Gustavo Marinho**
[BlindPay](https://www.ycombinator.com/launches/</companies/blindpay>)
a month ago
[ ](https://www.ycombinator.com/launches/<https:/twitter.com/intent/tweet?text=BlindPay+just+launched+on+%40ycombinator%27s+Launch+YC%21%0A%0ABlindPay+-+Stablecoin+API+for+Global+Payments.+Check+them+out%3A&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.ycombinator.com%2Flaunches%2FMeM-blindpay-stablecoin-api-for-global-payments>)
Embed
<https://blindpay.com/>
#api#fintech#payments#crypto/web3
### **TL;DR**
BlindPay is a stablecoin API that helps companies navigate LatAm's complex financial regulations while enabling fast and affordable global payments. Watch our demo [here](https://www.ycombinator.com/launches/<https:/www.youtube.com/watch?v=N9hHISlGp9Y>).
### **The Problem**
Businesses face significant hurdles when sending and receiving global payments:
  * Traditional methods rely on correspondent banks, adding fees (1.5-6% for B2B) and delays of 2-5 business days or more. Bank transfers typically require 2-4 intermediaries between smaller countries, with costs reaching hundreds of dollars.
  * Frequent fluctuations in Latin American currencies, coupled with extreme inflation rates (over 50% annually in some countries), make international payments unpredictable and risky.
  * Complex regulations and strict compliance rules across jurisdictions require different documentation for each institution.
  * Fragmented payment landscapes across countries require integration with multiple local payment systems (like SPEI, Pix, PSE), making implementation resource-intensive


### **Our Solution**
Our API integrates seamlessly with your existing workflows. With BlindPay you can:
  * Send and receive payments using fiat money and stablecoins
  * Get competitive FX quotes and low transaction fees
  * Connect directly to local instant payment systems across Latin America
  * 24/7 payments with instant settlement
  * Ensure compliance through blockchain screening, tiered KYC/KYB levels, and continuous transaction monitoring


Expand your global reach while reducing costs and transaction times by up to 80%. Powered by stablecoins and blockchain, our platform eliminates the delays, high fees, and regulatory barriers of traditional payment systems.
![](https://www.ycombinator.com/media/?type=post&id=87070&key=user_uploads/2098545/f81c874e-a8e7-4a92-ab1e-de8897529a63)
### **Developer Experience**
Add fiat gateways to your apps with minimal code. Our SDKs support multiple languages and frameworks, backed by a developer-friendly REST API with public OpenAPI documentation.
  * Support for multiple blockchains and major stablecoins
  * Direct integration with local payment systems like SPEI (Mexico), Pix (Brazil), PSE (Colombia) and Transfers (Argentina)
  * Separate sandbox and production environments with unique API keys and webhooks
  * Real-time payment tracking and transaction monitoring


### **Team**
![](https://www.ycombinator.com/media/?type=post&id=87070&key=user_uploads/2098545/d3fdd3f4-c653-427c-8e06-159b1ac4809f)
**Bernardo Simonassi (CEO)** has been shaping the stablecoin payments industry for the past 3 years, where he developed the first payroll platform powered by stablecoins. Previously at PicPay, he developed instant payment solutions serving 60M+ users.
**Gabriel Lyra (CTO)** led software engineering at LendingClub, where he architected and implemented critical financial infrastructure handling $50B in monthly loan transactions. Previously at AWS, he optimized infrastructure scripts that reduced monthly costs from $15M to $1M.
**João Borges (COO)** is a prominent leader and entrepreneur, best known for founding one of Brazil's largest blockchain startups. In its first year of operation, he successfully scaled the company to seven-digit revenue and raised millions of dollars from top-tier venture capitalists. João is also an active contributor to the Nouns DAO ecosystem and has been recognized on the Forbes 30 Under 30 list.
**Gustavo Marinho (CPO)** is a former product leader at top-tier Brazilian fintechs, where he specialized in consumer-facing financial solutions for Latin America. Previously at PicPay, he built instant payment solutions and credit products, successfully growing a personal loan portfolio to over $100M within six months of launch.
### **Our Ask**
Hey founders, are you building a product that needs global payment functionality? Email us at founders@blindpay.com
BlindPay is the simplest way to integrate global payments into your product:
  * Neobanks & fintech
  * Payroll solutions
  * Remittance providers
  * Wallet infrastructure providers
  * Traditional FX industry
  * Stablecoin aggregators
  * Marketplaces & platforms
  * Gaming & crypto apps
  * Billing & invoicing software
  * Freelancer & gig economy tools

For Educators
## GradeWiz is Coming to Your Institution!
We're bringing the magic of AI-powered grading to education. Help your students learn and grow with instant, encouraging feedback that speaks their language. 
[ Join Waitlist ](https://www.gradewiz.ai/<#>)
For Homework
## Grade in just a few clicks
![Math](https://www.gradewiz.ai/images/ico-math.svg)
### Students Upload Work
When a student submits their exam or assignment, GradeWiz applies computer vision techniques to segment the work into individual questions.
![step arrow](https://www.gradewiz.ai/images/step-s.svg)
![scan](https://www.gradewiz.ai/images/ico-scan.svg)
### AI-Powered Grading, Feedback
GradeWiz uses our Symphony Model to complete the grading rubric and generate detailed, individualized feedback. We focus on explaining where the student went wrong, while emphasizing what they did well.
![step arrow](https://www.gradewiz.ai/images/step-s.svg)
![review](https://www.gradewiz.ai/images/ico-review.svg)
### Instructor Review
After review by the instructor, feedback and grades can be released to students with a single click. GradeWiz also provides in-depth analysis on student performance such as common mistakes.
For Exams
## A week of grading done in minutes
![scheme 1](https://www.gradewiz.ai/images/scheme-1.svg)![mobile scheme 1](https://www.gradewiz.ai/images/mobile-scheme-1.png)
Features
## Powerful AI tools to supercharge your assessment
![rubric](https://www.gradewiz.ai/images/ico-rubric-g.svg)
### AI Rubric generation
Create detailed rubrics for your entire assignment with one click
![regrade](https://www.gradewiz.ai/images/ico-regrade.svg)
### AI Regrade
Tailor GradeWiz to grade exactly the way you do. Give it instructions, the same way you would instruct a TA.
![parsing](https://www.gradewiz.ai/images/ico-parsing.svg)
### AI Parsing
Reuse your old assignments by uploading them to GradeWiz, in seconds
![analytics](https://www.gradewiz.ai/images/ico-analitics.svg)
### AI Analytics
Get a big picture understanding of common student mistakes to help tailor your teaching.
Benefits
## We help your students learn by helping you teach
01
### Less time spent grading
Instead of going through and grading every single question by yourself, tell our model how to grade it instead. Then review the grades and instruct the model on any changes to grading.
02
### Detailed, actionable feedback
GradeWiz generates an entire paragraph of tailored feedback for each student, helping them learn from their mistakes with minimal frustration.
03
### Fair, consistent grading
GradeWiz is completely objective in its grading - it doesn't get tired from late night sessions and it doesn't rush to make it for dinner. Give your students access to the hardest working grader ever.
04
### Tailored teaching
Transform grading data into actionable insights. GradeWiz analyzes student responses to identify common misconceptions and knowledge gaps across your class to adapt your teaching strategy in real-time.
