## Frequently asked questions
Getting Started Using GradeWiz Feedback and Grading Account and Privacy General
### [How do I create an account? ![plus](https://www.gradewiz.ai/images/plus.svg) ](https://www.gradewiz.ai/<#>)
To create an account, visit the login page and follow the prompts to enter your information. You will receive a confirmation email to activate your account.
### [How do I log in? ![plus](https://www.gradewiz.ai/images/plus.svg) ](https://www.gradewiz.ai/<#>)
Go to the login page and enter your email and password. If you forgot your password, use the "Forgot Password" link to reset it.
### [What information do I need to create an account? ![plus](https://www.gradewiz.ai/images/plus.svg) ](https://www.gradewiz.ai/<#>)
For a teacher account, you'll need your First Name, Last Name, School Name, email address, and an access code. If you're interested in a free trial and need an access code, email support@gradewiz.ai.
### [How do I confirm my email address after signing up? ![plus](https://www.gradewiz.ai/images/plus.svg) ](https://www.gradewiz.ai/<#>)
You will receive a verification email with a link to confirm your email address. 
### [What should I do if I don't receive the confirmation email? ![plus](https://www.gradewiz.ai/images/plus.svg) ](https://www.gradewiz.ai/<#>)
Check out [How Do I Sign Up?](https://www.gradewiz.ai/<https:/drive.google.com/file/d/1Q2ahTxVlJQFLk75NR11IXOsaMBz_Jpu4/view>) documentation.
### [How do I change my account password? ![plus](https://www.gradewiz.ai/images/plus.svg) ](https://www.gradewiz.ai/<#>)
Click "Forgot Password" on the login page and enter your email to reset your password.
### [Can I create multiple accounts with the same email? ![plus](https://www.gradewiz.ai/images/plus.svg) ](https://www.gradewiz.ai/<#>)
No, each email address can only be associated with one account.
### [How do I update my profile information? ![plus](https://www.gradewiz.ai/images/plus.svg) ](https://www.gradewiz.ai/<#>)
Currently, you cannot modify your account information after signing up, so please be careful when entering your details.
### [Is there a mobile app for GradeWiz? ![plus](https://www.gradewiz.ai/images/plus.svg) ](https://www.gradewiz.ai/<#>)
No, we do not have a mobile app at the moment. If you think there's a need, please reach out to support@gradewiz.ai with your suggestions.
### [What file formats are supported for assignment submissions? ![plus](https://www.gradewiz.ai/images/plus.svg) ](https://www.gradewiz.ai/<#>)
Standard GradeWiz assignments only support PDF files for assignment submissions. Flex Assignments allow for textual input, images, and multiple-choice questions.
### [How do I create an assignment? ![plus](https://www.gradewiz.ai/images/plus.svg) ](https://www.gradewiz.ai/<#>)
Navigate to the "Assignments" tab and click "Create New Assignment." Upload the assignment PDF you'd like to use as a starting point, and GradeWiz will automatically input all the fields for you.
### [How do teacher submissions work? ![plus](https://www.gradewiz.ai/images/plus.svg) ](https://www.gradewiz.ai/<#>)
For teacher submissions, used for in-class assignments or exams, the teacher collects, scans, and submits the assignment. Automatic handwriting recognition detects the student's name and ID on the top of the page to assign the work to them.
### [How do student submissions work? ![plus](https://www.gradewiz.ai/images/plus.svg) ](https://www.gradewiz.ai/<#>)
For student submissions (i.e., take-home assignments), students are responsible for scanning and submitting their assignments as PDFs on the assignment page.
### [Can I edit an assignment after it has been created? ![plus](https://www.gradewiz.ai/images/plus.svg) ](https://www.gradewiz.ai/<#>)
Yes, you can edit the assignment until it is published. Once published, the assignment cannot be edited. If you made a mistake, you would need to delete it and create a new one. This prevents discrepancies between the distributed assignment PDFs and the updated versions. 
### [How do I delete an assignment? ![plus](https://www.gradewiz.ai/images/plus.svg) ](https://www.gradewiz.ai/<#>)
Click the trash can icon on the assignment list to delete an assignment.
### [How do I view all submissions for an assignment? ![plus](https://www.gradewiz.ai/images/plus.svg) ](https://www.gradewiz.ai/<#>)
After clicking on the assignment, scroll down to review submissions either by student or by question. Reviewing by student allows you to see each student's entire submission, while reviewing by question lets you compare responses to the same question across different students.
### [Can students submit assignments late? ![plus](https://www.gradewiz.ai/images/plus.svg) ](https://www.gradewiz.ai/<#>)
Yes, late submissions are accepted until grades are published.
### [How do I set deadlines for assignments? ![plus](https://www.gradewiz.ai/images/plus.svg) ](https://www.gradewiz.ai/<#>)
You will be prompted to set a deadline when creating an assignment. You can also edit the deadline later by clicking on the top bar in the assignment page.
### [How do I provide detailed feedback? ![plus](https://www.gradewiz.ai/images/plus.svg) ](https://www.gradewiz.ai/<#>)
GradeWiz uses AI to generate initial feedback on student assignments. This feedback includes comments on key areas such as content accuracy, writing quality, and overall presentation. You can review and edit the feedback to ensure it meets your standards and addresses specific points you want to emphasize. To edit the feedback, open the student's submission, and you will see the AI-generated comments. Click on any comment to modify it or add additional notes. You can also add new comments to the submission for more personalized feedback.
### [Can I use my rubrics for grading? ![plus](https://www.gradewiz.ai/images/plus.svg) ](https://www.gradewiz.ai/<#>)
Yes, you can create custom rubrics in the "Rubrics" section and apply them to assignments for consistent and detailed grading. Additionally, you can use GradeWiz AI to generate detailed, specific rubrics for your assignment by clicking on the Magic Wand icon next to your question.
### [How accurate is the AI-generated feedback? ![plus](https://www.gradewiz.ai/images/plus.svg) ](https://www.gradewiz.ai/<#>)
GradeWiz has a 95% accuracy rate when benchmarked against teaching assistants for introductory to medium-level classes.
### [How do I share graded assignments with students? ![plus](https://www.gradewiz.ai/images/plus.svg) ](https://www.gradewiz.ai/<#>)
Click "Publish Grades" on the assignment page to share graded assignments with students.
### [Can students see the grading rubrics? ![plus](https://www.gradewiz.ai/images/plus.svg) ](https://www.gradewiz.ai/<#>)
Yes, students can view the grading rubrics used for their assignments.
### [How do I provide an answer key for an assignment? ![plus](https://www.gradewiz.ai/images/plus.svg) ](https://www.gradewiz.ai/<#>)
After creating the assignment, professors should download the PDF, fill it out, and submit it for extraction. This is optional but highly encouraged as it increases grading accuracy and allows for less detailed rubrics.
### [How do I delete my account? ![plus](https://www.gradewiz.ai/images/plus.svg) ](https://www.gradewiz.ai/<#>)
Go to your profile, select "Delete Account," and confirm. This will permanently delete all associated data, including classes, grades, and submission history.
### [What data does GradeWiz collect from users? ![plus](https://www.gradewiz.ai/images/plus.svg) ](https://www.gradewiz.ai/<#>)
GradeWiz only collects necessary cookies to keep you logged in. We do not use marketing, targeting, or personalization cookies and will never sell your data.
### [How is my data protected? ![plus](https://www.gradewiz.ai/images/plus.svg) ](https://www.gradewiz.ai/<#>)
Your data is protected using SSL protocol encryption and does not leave the platform without being anonymized. To learn more, reach out to legal@gradewiz.ai
### [Can I export my data from GradeWiz? ![plus](https://www.gradewiz.ai/images/plus.svg) ](https://www.gradewiz.ai/<#>)
Yes, you can export your grades as a CSV file from the assignment page by clicking "Export Grades."
### [What should I do if I suspect a security breach? ![plus](https://www.gradewiz.ai/images/plus.svg) ](https://www.gradewiz.ai/<#>)
Contact support@gradewiz.ai immediately and provide a detailed description of the issue.
### [How do I report a problem with my account? ![plus](https://www.gradewiz.ai/images/plus.svg) ](https://www.gradewiz.ai/<#>)
Reach out to support@gradewiz.ai for assistance with any account issues.
### [How can I contact GradeWiz support? ![plus](https://www.gradewiz.ai/images/plus.svg) ](https://www.gradewiz.ai/<#>)
You can contact us at support@gradewiz.ai or schedule a meeting [here (preferred)](https://www.gradewiz.ai/<https:/calendly.com/maxbohun/gradewiz>).
### [Are there any training sessions or webinars available for new users? ![plus](https://www.gradewiz.ai/images/plus.svg) ](https://www.gradewiz.ai/<#>)
Yes, please schedule a training session [here](https://www.gradewiz.ai/<https:/calendly.com/maxbohun/gradewiz>).
### [How do I provide feedback about GradeWiz? ![plus](https://www.gradewiz.ai/images/plus.svg) ](https://www.gradewiz.ai/<#>)
We value your feedback. Please reach out to support@gradewiz.ai with your comments and suggestions.

Name: Adam
Headline: AI Powered CAD Design
Description: Adam is an AI CAD co-pilot for hardware design. It transforms plain text descriptions into parametric 3D models in seconds so engineering teams can ship 10x faster. Our mission is to eliminate the gap between engineering and reality so more great ideas come into existence.
Founder1_Description:
CEO & Co-Founder @Adam. Previously AI Research & Engineering @Adept and Design @Berkeley. 

You can just make things.
Founder2_Description:
COO & Co-Founder @Adam. Shipped designs to millions of people @VIVO | Previously @BMW, NIO, and Design @Berkeley. 

Building the future of CAD and manufacturing.
Founder3_Description: CTO & Co-Founder @Adam. | Previously Co-Founder and Head of Software Engineering @BioGlyph (CAD for Biologics)

# Adam - AI Co-Pilot for CAD ⚙️⚙
Adam helps engineers 10x their CAD workflows with simple AI prompts
**Zach Dive**
[Adam](https://www.ycombinator.com/launches/</companies/adam>)
25 days ago
[ ](https://www.ycombinator.com/launches/<https:/twitter.com/intent/tweet?text=Adam+just+launched+on+%40ycombinator%27s+Launch+YC%21%0A%0AAdam+-+AI+Co-Pilot+for+CAD+%E2%9A%99%EF%B8%8F%E2%9A%99.+Check+them+out%3A&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.ycombinator.com%2Flaunches%2FMfX-adam-ai-co-pilot-for-cad>)
Embed
<https://www.adamcad.com/>
#hardware#design_tools#generative_ai
Hey YC! 👋 We're [Aaron](https://www.ycombinator.com/launches/<https:/x.com/aaronhetengli>), [Avi](https://www.ycombinator.com/launches/<https:/x.com/avimakesrobots>) and [Zach](https://www.ycombinator.com/launches/<https:/x.com/zachdive>) from Adam and we are building AI Powered CAD for mechanical design. Our first launch is our Text to CAD editor. Some of our early users have called it the **Vercel V0 for CAD**. You simply put a prompt in on our web-app and we generate a parametric CAD file for you. Check out our fun promo vid 👇. <https://youtu.be/Pw6KGqgygqw>
**TL;DR:**
  * 🔧 Use our **Text-to-CAD** model to accelerate your mechanical design workflows
  * 🪛 Adjust the **Parametric CAD** with our dynamically generated sliders
  * 🛠 Export and **ready to 3D print in seconds**


### **Problem**
**Slow** Legacy CAD software is weighed down by antiquated UX and outdated geometry rendering from the early 90s.
**Repetitive** Mechanical engineers and design professionals spend hours everyday restarting projects due to rigid workflows. The current tools are clunky and slow to iterate in meaning the iteration process is greatly slowed down.
**Demands significant expertise** The complexity of CAD tools hinders rapid prototyping and wider adoption.
### **Solution**
Design professionals spend hours every week converting ideas into CAD design and its complexity often creates barriers for both professionals and newcomers. The Adam web-app provides a frictionless experience to start rapidly prototyping and shipping out great ideas.
**We support two different modes of interaction**
_1. Conversational design through chat_
![](https://www.ycombinator.com/media/?type=post&id=87143&key=user_uploads/1626462/6c4b0839-2b67-4e55-b857-ae6e11f20703)
_2. Parametric edits through sliders_
![](https://www.ycombinator.com/media/?type=post&id=87143&key=user_uploads/1626462/e97bde5c-d49a-4be9-b1b0-4e0fc329a5fa)
### **One more thing..**
We are building an Adam Co-Pilot that integrates seamlessly within professional-grade CAD workflows. Think of this as the **Cursor for CAD.** It takes in the context of your CAD environment and is able to make directed edits for you. Check out an early prototype (more on this to come…)! <https://www.loom.com/share/7c945465a21e4fb7abfd557299be4925>
### **We are on a mission to remove the friction between engineering and reality so more great ideas come into existence.**
👉 If you resonate, please reach out to us here: founders@adamcad.com
<3
![](https://www.ycombinator.com/media/?type=post&id=87143&key=user_uploads/1626462/d50e9f22-e38f-4a6d-b0b7-eea7dedcba0a)

Cuckoo is a real-time AI translator for global sales, marketing, and support. Companies like Snowflake and PagerDuty use Cuckoo in Zoom and in-person meetings for even the most technical discussions.

Founder1_Description:
Co-founder, CEO & Engineer at Cuckoo, AI interpreter for global teams.

Founder2_Description:

Before Cuckoo, I was the first GTM at two startups in Korea—one focused on online programming and the other on AI infrastructure—where I also led event marketing involving international speakers. I studied Electrical Engineering and Science & Technology Policy at KAIST.

# Cuckoo: Real-time AI translator for global sales, marketing, and support
Cuckoo helps companies like Snowflake and PagerDuty talk to their global customers, even in the most technical discussions.
**Yong Hee Lee**
[Cuckoo Labs](https://www.ycombinator.com/launches/</companies/cuckoo-labs>)
15 days ago
[ ](https://www.ycombinator.com/launches/<https:/twitter.com/intent/tweet?text=Cuckoo+Labs+just+launched+on+%40ycombinator%27s+Launch+YC%21%0A%0ACuckoo%3A+Real-time+AI+translator+for+global+sales%2C+marketing%2C+and+support.+Check+them+out%3A&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.ycombinator.com%2Flaunches%2FMjg-cuckoo-real-time-ai-translator-for-global-sales-marketing-and-support>)
Embed
<https://www.cuckoo.so/>
#b2b#saas#ai_assistant#artificial_intelligence
### **TLDR**
[**Cuckoo**](https://www.ycombinator.com/launches/<https:/www.cuckoo.so>) is a real-time AI translator for global sales, marketing, and support. Companies like Snowflake and PagerDuty use Cuckoo in Zoom and in-person meetings for even the most technical discussions.
Here an example of us having a product, sales, and partner meeting with our W25 batchmates and one of our partners in Japan: [**https://youtu.be/7fq7wr_S8p0**](https://www.ycombinator.com/launches/<https:/youtu.be/7fq7wr_S8p0>)
—
Hey everyone! We are [Yong Hee](https://www.ycombinator.com/launches/<https:/www.linkedin.com/in/harryyongheelee/>) and [Gunwoo](https://www.ycombinator.com/launches/<https:/www.linkedin.com/in/gunwooterry/>) and we are building Cuckoo to help global teams talk to their customers worldwide. [Give it a try](https://www.ycombinator.com/launches/<https:/www.cuckoo.so>) in your next global meeting 🌏
### **Why?**
**Language barriers are a big challenge even for global companies.** We experienced this firsthand in Korea, where we hosted community meetups, inviting product leaders around the world.
On the one hand, many nuances and details can get lost between languages, especially during technical conversations. On the other hand, speakers often felt isolated, unable to follow Korean discussions, and missed valuable opportunities to network and promote their products.
### **Problem**
Take Matt, a Solutions Engineer at PagerDuty APJ, who engages weekly with customers in Korea and Japan. These conversations are complicated not just by language barriers but also by technical details—think complex troubleshooting scenarios.
### **Solution**
**Cuckoo provides real-time translation tailored for you and your customers.** It instantly learns technical details from your documents—pitch decks, meeting notes, API docs—and delivers context-aware translation in 20+ languages.
### **How it works**
Invite Cuckoo to your online meeting. For in-person conversations, you can capture audio directly from your laptop.
![](https://www.ycombinator.com/media/?type=post&id=87400&key=user_uploads/427995/829469eb-8895-44f0-b686-b2c45bb2f716)
Upload relevant documents (pitch decks, API docs, user manuals, etc.) to help Cuckoo understand the general context and key terms.
![](https://www.ycombinator.com/media/?type=post&id=87400&key=user_uploads/427995/64f98ba9-db35-43ca-b791-45ca41cd442f)
As the conversation unfolds, your and your customer can view live translations in your preferred languages.
![](https://www.ycombinator.com/media/?type=post&id=87400&key=user_uploads/427995/cd8cd259-5e60-4bb2-bfd1-808ea19577bc)
### **How our customers use Cuckoo**
We— _our first customer_ —use Cuckoo everyday to demo and collect user feedback. Here’s how other teams use Cuckoo.
  * Snowflake — Hosting global customers at their Customer Experience Centers
  * PagerDuty — Troubleshooting with local cloud partners in Korea and Japan
  * ClickHouse — Team sync between the APAC and HQ office
  * dbt Labs — Webinars for APAC customers and partners
  * Weights & Biases — Hosting Seoul and Tokyo meetups with HQ executives


Cuckoo is also used by enterprises beyond the tech industry, including healthcare (SNOMED), manufacturing (SeAH Steel), and retail (GS).
### **Asks**
Are you dealing with cross-regional operations? Do you work with international customers regularly, or are you planning to expand into new markets?
  * **Try out Cuckoo** at [www.cuckoo.so](https://www.ycombinator.com/launches/<http:/www.cuckoo.so>) — your first conversation is on us!
  * **Let’s chat!** — We can hop on a quick call—we’ll speak in Korean and Japanese so you can see how Cuckoo works with different languages.
  * [**Schedule a meeting**](https://www.ycombinator.com/launches/<https:/cal.com/cuckoohq/30min>) — We’d love to learn more about your language challenges and how we can help.
  * **Email us** at [founders@cuckoo.so](https://www.ycombinator.com/launches/<https:/mailto:founders@cuckoo.so>) — Tell us how your first meeting went, and send any feedback or thoughts!


### **A bit about us**
[Gunwoo](https://www.ycombinator.com/launches/<https:/www.linkedin.com/in/gunwooterry/>) and [Yong Hee](https://www.ycombinator.com/launches/<https:/www.linkedin.com/in/harryyongheelee/>) first met in 2015 through a student club at KAIST, where we organized an annual international conference for undergraduate students. Since then, we have been talking about starting a company together.
![](https://www.ycombinator.com/media/?type=post&id=87400&key=user_uploads/427995/ec2ae8db-a08a-4a52-8686-72b1923350a0)
[See All Launches ›](https://www.ycombinator.com/launches/</launches>)

Name: Quantstruct
Headline: Auto-improve & publish technical docs with AI
Description:
Quantstruct automatically creates and improves product documentation, implementation guides, and changelogs for API & SDK products, web-based enterprise software, and internal applications.

Quantstruct identifies gaps in your knowledge base based on each product release or unfulfilled customer query. It uses multiple AI agents to search existing knowledge sources, test existing docs for validity and style guidelines, and clicks, scrolls, and uses enterprise software through a web browser to generate docs with embedded screenshots and video recordings. Quanstruct is available as a cloud service to start, targeting technical writers, content writing, professional services, and product teams.

Traditional generative AI tools risk hallucinating critical API & SDK fields, even with RAG based approaches. Purely agent-based approaches risk providing unpredictable output that can diverge from desired documentation processes. Finally, no company’s review and publishing workflow is the same. Quantstruct is the easiest way to onboard and customize AI agents to continuously improve your documentation based on your customer needs and product evolution. https://quantstruct.com
Tags: industry:artificial-intelligence; industry:developer-tools; industry:b2b; industry:api; industry:automation; location:san-francisco-bay-area
Founder1_Description: Co-founder of Quantstruct. We're building AI agents to create the best documentation for your product. Newman previously built search infrastructure at Moveworks and Replit (YC W18), where he managed mission critical platforms powering Gen AI experiences for Fortune 500 companies. EECS @ Berkeley
Founder2_Description: Cofounder of Quantstruct (YC W25). Built an agent developer platform from 0 to $2+ million as product lead while onboarding multiple Fortune 100 companies at Moveworks. Published and reviewed 1000s of documentation guide updates to support customers and internal teams, before realizing agent-based workflows could do his job. Ex-Kleiner Perkins fellow. Published research with Google Glass inventor (who coined “wearable computing”) at Georgia Tech.

# Quantstruct 🤖 – Improve Your Technical Docs 24x7 with AI Agents
Kill documentation debt, update docs automatically, research & validate docs
**Sarthak Srinivas**
[Quantstruct](https://www.ycombinator.com/launches/</companies/quantstruct>)
25 days ago
[ ](https://www.ycombinator.com/launches/<https:/twitter.com/intent/tweet?text=Quantstruct+just+launched+on+%40ycombinator%27s+Launch+YC%21%0A%0AQuantstruct+%F0%9F%A4%96+%E2%80%93+Improve+Your+Technical+Docs+24x7+with+AI+Agents.+Check+them+out%3A&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.ycombinator.com%2Flaunches%2FMfQ-quantstruct-improve-your-technical-docs-24x7-with-ai-agents>)
Embed
<https://quantstruct.com>
#b2b#api#automation#developer_tools#artificial_intelligence
# **tl;dr**
Quantstruct is an AI technical writer that improves your documentation 24x7 with agents to research, test, and update your docs. We already work with hypergrowth companies like [Vapi (YC W21)](https://www.ycombinator.com/launches/<https:/vapi.ai>) and enterprises who build API & SDK products, visual software, and platforms where nurturing a vibrant developer and partner community with bespoke docs helps you win.
[Sign up to get onboarded](https://www.ycombinator.com/launches/<https:/quantstruct.com>) today!
<https://youtu.be/smbT-M3F1vs>
## **Problem**
The best product & customer teams stomach some difficult truths to serve their customers today:
  1. **Product & customer education demands active effort** from product and engineering experts with limited time
  2. **Teams need to understand too much** source code, support, communication threads & product specs to properly guide customers
  3. **High-quality docs require 100% validation** to test code snippets, external links, accessibility guidelines, take screenshots, and other references. Traditional Gen AI falls short.
  4. **Helping customers supersedes keeping docs up to date**


The result? **Documentation debt** - where your product and technical docs & implementation plans go increasingly out of sync.
We felt this pain thousands of times previously, when we helped Fortune 500 customers integrate with 100s of enterprise software platforms that were poorly documented. We saw how **documentation debt** could escalate customer support issues and lead to customers not adopting and championing the platform.
We also saw how paying down documentation debt could amplify each team’s impact, inspire customer love, and help nurture a community of strongly activated champions.
## **Solution**
Quantstruct connects to your docs platform, GitHub, and Slack to continuously update your docs
  1. When a **PR** occurs, Quantstruct works behind the scenes and notifies you about a companion docs update
  2. Each type of doc update can be configured with tools and agents to 
     * _Check WCAG accessibility guidelines_
     * _Check broken links_
     * _Take screenshots and videos_
     * _Generate system architecture diagrams_
     * _Validate code blocks_
     * _and much, much more._
  3. You can manually edit the doc or provide high-level instructions, and Quantstruct updates and publishes the necessary sections without work
  4. Quantstruct’s platform will take care of the hard bits of coordinating multiple agents, self-evaluating and improving performance, following your specific review & publishing workflows


## **The ask**
Sign up for [Quantstruct](https://www.ycombinator.com/launches/<https:/quantstruct.com>), and install our GitHub and Slack apps to get started! You can also reach out to founders@quantstruct.com to guide you through the onboarding process.
# **The team**
**Sarthak** has worked at growth-stage companies like Moveworks as a Kleiner Perkins product fellow, where he built an agent developer platform from 0 to $2+ million.
**Newman** has built search infrastructure at Moveworks and Replit (YC W18), where he managed mission-critical platforms powering Gen AI experiences for Fortune 100 companies.
Both are published researchers and patent holders from **Georgia Tech CS** and **Berkeley EECS,** respectively.
We’ve spent our careers building for developers at enterprise software companies and deeply empathize with the pressures that support, customer success, product, and GTM teams face to build world-class developer products and ecosystems.
![](https://www.ycombinator.com/media/?type=post&id=87136&key=user_uploads/120963/9b5326c4-b1e2-4845-ae3f-1ac50417a262)

Name: Lucidic AI
Headline: See Your Agent's Mind at Work
Description: As AI agents take on more complex tasks, ensuring reliability, accuracy, and efficiency is critical. Lucidic's Agentlytics provides tools for developers and engineers to test, debug, and optimize AI agents at scale, giving you full visibility into their decision-making. Modify prompts and re-run tests/simulations, watch step-by-step video replays of your agent’s execution, compare different models and configurations side by side, and visualize decision trees to prevent failures before they happen. Make sure your agents operate smoothly, adapt to changes, and perform as expected in real-world deployments.
Tags: industry:aiops; industry:artificial-intelligence; industry:developer-tools; industry:saas; industry:automation; location:san-francisco-bay-area
Founder1_Description:
Founder/CTO at Lucidic AI, working on an analytics, testing, and simulations framework for AI agent devs. Stanford BS/MS Computer Science (AI specialization). Ex Citadel, AppLovin.  

Previously built GrocerCheck, a COVID-19 web app helping shoppers social distance effectively, with over 200,000 users and endorsed by the Government of Canada. 

Reach me at andy@lucidic.ai
Founder2_Description:
Hi, I’m Abhinav the founder and CEO for Lucidic AI! I’m from Stanford where I studied Computer Science with an AI specialization (both bachelor's and master's) and did research at Stanford's AI Lab.  I’ve worked at Apple as a software engineer and at Citadel Securities and Susquehanna International Group as a quant. 

In my free time, I like to play basketball, pickleball, lift, and rewatch Christopher Nolan movies!

Feel free to reach out, would love to chat -- abhinav@lucidic.ai
Founder3_Description: Hi! I'm Jeremy Tian, one of the founders and the Chief Scientist at Lucidic AI, working to explain your AI models' decisions. I have a BS/MS in Computer Science with an AI specialization from Stanford University. Ex. Quantitative Trader at DRW and software engineering/machine learning engineering at Steel Dynamics. Contact me at jeremy@lucidic.ai!

# Lucidic – Analytics and testing platform for rapid agent iteration
Cut AI agent debugging time from days to minutes with visual workflows and simulations
**Andy Liang**
[Lucidic AI](https://www.ycombinator.com/launches/</companies/lucidic-ai>)
6 days ago
[ ](https://www.ycombinator.com/launches/<https:/twitter.com/intent/tweet?text=Lucidic+AI+just+launched+on+%40ycombinator%27s+Launch+YC%21%0A%0ALucidic+%E2%80%93+Analytics+and+testing+platform+for+rapid+agent+iteration.+Check+them+out%3A&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.ycombinator.com%2Flaunches%2FMn7-lucidic-analytics-and-testing-platform-for-rapid-agent-iteration>)
Embed
<https://lucidic.ai>
#saas#aiops#automation#developer_tools#artificial_intelligence
**TL;DR:** Lucidic is an AI agent analytics platform that maps every step of your agent's workflow and simulates their performance at scale, cutting iteration time from weeks to minutes. Instead of sifting through logs, you get a visual breakdown—searchable workflow replays, decision nodes with outcome probabilities, step-by-step agent action trajectories, and side-by-side simulation comparisons.
<https://youtu.be/UI_Y9R_8XHo>
### **The Problem:_Building Good Agents is Hard_**
When we started building agents, it seemed trivial: Call GPT a few times, string together some logic, and it works—until it doesn’t.
The moment you become complex, it’s a disaster. One day, your agent is working fine; the next, it’s breaking for no reason. With misaligned reasoning, brittle logic chains, unclear failure cases, or silent performance degradation, you end up spending hours rerunning prompts, tweaking edge cases, and wondering why something that _should_ work just doesn’t.
And don’t even get me started on debugging. Running the same prompt over and over again, hoping this time it’ll behave the way you want? That’s not a strategy—it’s a nightmare.
### **Our Solution**
Lucidic changes the game. No more late nights staring at a terminal, guessing what went wrong. See exactly how your agent’s brain works—replay actions step by step, inspect decision trees, and visualize internal reasoning in real time. Modify prompts and logic with instant, structured feedback so you’re never debugging in the dark again.
No more trial-and-error fixes—just clear, interactive breakdowns of why your agent fails and how to fix it. Test at scale, compare behaviors side by side and optimize performance before deployment. Intelligently visualize thousands of complete workflow trajectories at once, showing success rates, failure points, and decision paths for faster debugging.
![](https://www.ycombinator.com/media/?type=post&id=87613&key=user_uploads/2373805/c20ef166-dd3a-4177-9cce-59c9e7d893ff)
### **Get Started**
  * Sign up for our private beta: [lucidic.ai](https://www.ycombinator.com/launches/<http:/lucidic.ai>)
  * Book a demo with us [here](https://www.ycombinator.com/launches/<https:/calendly.com/team-lucidic/30min>)
  * If you know anyone who is building agents, send ‘em over: team@lucidic.ai


**_🧠Stop watching agents run. Start seeing how they think._**
![](https://www.ycombinator.com/media/?type=post&id=87613&key=user_uploads/2373805/99bae66d-27ac-49e2-89b5-1e2111b096f9)
### **The Team**
Abhinav, Andy, and Jeremy met while playing Super Smash Bros freshman year at Stanford. Since then, they’ve worked on multiple deep learning research projects together. Abhinav (CEO) has worked as a researcher at the Stanford AI Lab, a quant at Citadel and SIG, and a software engineer at Apple. Andy (CTO) qualified to represent Stanford (one of three) at the North American Championship for the largest collegiate programming competition in the world (ICPC). Jeremy (Chief Scientist) is a dedicated machine learning researcher with years of experience working on state-of-the-art models at Steel Dynamics (F500) and DRW.
![](https://www.ycombinator.com/media/?type=post&id=87613&key=user_uploads/2373805/eb44324d-21b4-4793-adea-654c9b6ac45b)

# Ergo⚡Make Your Existing CRM Autonomous
Reap the benefits of a well-kept CRM without the headache of managing one.
**Yash Dulla**
[Ergo](https://www.ycombinator.com/launches/</companies/ergo>)
a month ago
[ ](https://www.ycombinator.com/launches/<https:/twitter.com/intent/tweet?text=Ergo+just+launched+on+%40ycombinator%27s+Launch+YC%21%0A%0AErgo%E2%9A%A1Make+Your+Existing+CRM+Autonomous.+Check+them+out%3A&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.ycombinator.com%2Flaunches%2FMdY-ergo-make-your-existing-crm-autonomous>)
Embed
<https://joinergo.com>
#ai#b2b#saas#sales
We’re Yash and Ishan, the co-founders of [Ergo](https://www.ycombinator.com/launches/<https:/joinergo.com/>). Ergo transforms your existing CRM into an autonomous system by connecting natural communication channels like Zoom, Gmail, and Slack. We make platforms like HubSpot or Salesforce fully self-updating so your team can focus on what truly matters—selling.
<https://youtu.be/2aa8cNKyCFE>
### **📉 The Problem**
Manual CRM updates are the bane of every sales team’s existence. Here’s why:
  * **Incomplete records** make forecasting and reporting unreliable.
  * **Missed updates** can lead to $100k+ in lost revenue.
  * **Superficial data** creates friction across sales, onboarding, and customer success.


For sales managers, founders, and account executives, this means wasted hours and missed opportunities.
### **📈 The Solution**
Ergo automates CRM updates & completes tasks pending human approval (e.g., follow-up emails, personalized nurturing).
Here’s what we do for you:
  * **For Sales Managers** : Gain real-time pipeline visibility without chasing your team for updates. Reporting and forecasting has never been more clear.
  * **For Founders** : Save 10+ hours a week and prevent costly pipeline bleed.
  * **For AEs and SDRs** : Focus on building relationships while Ergo handles CRM updates.
  * **For Onboarding and Customer Success Teams** : Access complete customer history without chasing upstream details.


### **⚙️ How Does Ergo Work?**
  1. **Connect Communication Channels** : Link Ergo to tools like Zoom, Gmail, or Slack.


![](https://www.ycombinator.com/media/?type=post&id=87020&key=user_uploads/1783321/5ee9281c-6b84-46d6-829a-5d7d861660a1)
  1. **Customizable Field Mappings** : Tailor Ergo to recognize specific fields and business needs.


![](https://www.ycombinator.com/media/?type=post&id=87020&key=user_uploads/1783321/d9dfe2e9-c057-4e65-9fb6-a0ec90a6882b)
  1. **Automated CRM Updates** : Ergo extracts key data from conversations to create deals, tasks, and update contact records.


![](https://lh7-rt.googleusercontent.com/docsz/AD_4nXeAoVGOF1R935qlCSZfiqjogTDAdIVdv_M8iGbOcixXKKpgIKTh4LRDhhsfw_rNYJaGFcXR6UNpUf8In0NRK7VzjdOz4rthCXge98_BXdLU8oGoH4o2e_tqOYqcj4ow3pHQLgxvwg?key=70Qt7FdXdEs5jIAEX7WSCJek)
### **🎬 Our Backstory**
Two months ago, Ishan and I were at Georgia Tech working on medical software when we went to Delve (YC W24) for advice. What began as a feedback call turned into an invitation to spend four days in San Francisco with them and join the team. While shadowing them, we saw how 15–20 daily sales calls led to missed follow-ups and poor record-keeping in HubSpot.
Inspired, we built an initial version of Ergo using a 72-step Zapier workflow that retroactively updated their CRM and unlocked and closed $75k in contracts. Encouraged by the results, we expanded the solution to integrate with more communication channels like email and Slack. Back in Atlanta, we tested Ergo with other founders and saw the same widespread problem—CRM management was universally painful.
**Check out the behemoth Zap we built that weekend:**
![](https://www.ycombinator.com/media/?type=post&id=87020&key=user_uploads/1783321/bac04ee0-47b1-4972-a644-9e3fb521a4d3)
### **TL;DR**
Ergo gives sales teams the benefits of a perfectly updated CRM—without the headache of managing it.
If CRM management feels like a chore for your team, let Ergo handle it for you. 👉 Visit us at [joinergo.com](https://www.ycombinator.com/launches/<http:/joinergo.com>)
Got questions? Email us at yash@joinergo.com & ishan@joinergo.com or DM us on X [@yashdulla](https://www.ycombinator.com/launches/<https:/x.com/yashdulla>) & [@ishansheth_](https://www.ycombinator.com/launches/<https:/x.com/ishansheth_>)

# Axiom - The Gateway to DeFi
Trade any asset on any chain, all under 1 account.
**Henry Zhang**
[Axiom](https://www.ycombinator.com/launches/</companies/axiom>)
5 days ago
[ ](https://www.ycombinator.com/launches/<https:/twitter.com/intent/tweet?text=Axiom+just+launched+on+%40ycombinator%27s+Launch+YC%21%0A%0AAxiom+-+The+Gateway+to+DeFi.+Check+them+out%3A&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.ycombinator.com%2Flaunches%2FMoK-axiom-the-gateway-to-defi>)
Embed
<https://axiom.trade>
#fintech#trading#crypto/web3#cryptocurrency#consumer_finance
**TL;DR:** Axiom is building the first platform that lets anyone trade anything in DeFi.
**The Problem:**
  * People in crypto focus too much on the tech rather than the user experience.
  * There are too many protocols and chains.
  * For every new chain and asset, you need to sign up and manage a different account/app.


**The Solution:**
Axiom is building the first app that lets you trade any asset on any chain, with all the technicalities abstracted away. No longer do you have to bridge, swap, manage all your assets through 5 different apps.
<https://youtu.be/QorrOJ2lhYQ>
**Our Ask**

Name: Bluebook
Headline: Self-driving accounting
Description:
Bluebook is building AI agents for accounting firms to accelerate research, reconciliations and monthly closings. We allow professionals to serve 200 clients instead of just 20. With research time cut by 30% accountants can provide more strategic advice to help their clients thrive. The 30 leading firms in the Nordics already use Bluebook.

The accounting industry faces a perfect storm: a massive CPA retirement wave (75% in the coming 15 years), increasing complexity from globalization and new regulations, and private equity consolidation driving productivity demands. LLMs enables software that can understand context, adapt to new scenarios, and handle complex accounting tasks with human-like reasoning - capabilities that traditional rule-based software lacks.
Founder1_Description: Co-founder of Bluebook, leading sales and operations to get our products into users' hands. Started flipping scooters at 13 from my parents' garage and have been fascinated on building businesses ever since.
Founder2_Description: Self-taught AI builder and seasoned founder. Developed my first webpage at age 8, founded my first company at 17, built a software consultancy generating millions in revenue, exited a product company, launched many failures. Last years spent as engineering leader at startups such as FirstVet, Mindler and Epidemic Sound.
Founder3_Description: Self-taught programmer and college dropout. Started working at 14 and haven’t been able to slow down ever since. For the past 4 years I've been studying physics while building AI systems for startups (Lovable amongst others) in the Stockholm area.

Name: superglue
Headline: a proxy server for automated data transformation
Description: superglue is an open-source tool that sits as a proxy in front of your API calls, automatically transforming data into exactly the format your system needs. Instead of writing custom code to map fields, handle different data structures, failure states and normalizing inconsistent formats, integration engineers can now define their desired output format and let superglue handle the entire transformation process automatically.
Founder1_Description: Building superglue, an open source tool to automate data transformation. Former Software engineer and Google APM with a master’s from Stanford.
Founder2_Description:
Building superglue. Previously worked on GTM at Scalable Capital and commercial projects at Farfetch. Built wantviva.com, a community marketplace for aesthetically pleasing objects. Write girlveryonline.substack.com to dissect how culture affects business. 
B.B.A. from Reichman University, Master's in CS and Finance from TUM and CDTM

# superglue 🍯 - Open Source Data Translation
Get data from any system in exactly the format you need.
**Adina Goerres**
[superglue](https://www.ycombinator.com/launches/</companies/superglue>)
13 days ago
[ ](https://www.ycombinator.com/launches/<https:/twitter.com/intent/tweet?text=superglue+just+launched+on+%40ycombinator%27s+Launch+YC%21%0A%0Asuperglue+%F0%9F%8D%AF+-+Open+Source+Data+Translation.+Check+them+out%3A&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.ycombinator.com%2Flaunches%2FMkE-superglue-open-source-data-translation>)
Embed
<https://superglue.cloud/>
#api#open_source#developer_tools#artificial_intelligence
**Tl;dr** [superglue](https://www.ycombinator.com/launches/<https:/superglue.cloud/>) translates data from any system into exactly the format you need. It’s an open source proxy that automatically extracts, maps and transforms data so developers don’t have to write and maintain complex integration code.
**Other tools say "Use our API". superglue says "Use any API, in any way you want".**
[Find us on GitHub.](https://www.ycombinator.com/launches/<https:/github.com/superglue-ai/superglue>)
![](https://lh7-rt.googleusercontent.com/docsz/AD_4nXejwKUtg5vNmIUFVD-naIZc3NVJVO4nIxzG1bVC5SkaA8g5JuhP7I9QWTBXPVCbKQdc6OY7bgFgVuJPf99JjYyBK3Y2TDpGG_ehUirAvBmANq8dkq9EpyY-72Dn56s6dW3LA6n82g?key=X6C0DCn4htyY5GQ3HDPmoqgF)
# **Why it matters**
Most companies struggle with data integration challenges daily. Energy providers pull meter readings from thousands of devices, fashion marketplaces standardize product data from various retailers, and fintech companies normalize transaction data across payment systems. Each system speaks its own language, forcing developers to write and maintain custom code to transform and normalize data. It's a massive waste of engineering resources and slows down business innovation.
# **What we’re building**
_superglue_ is an intelligent proxy server that automatically transforms data from external APIs into your desired format, eliminating the need for custom mapping code. By sitting between your application and APIs, it allows developers to define data structures once and apply consistent transformations across all integrations, turning complex data integration from a weeks-long project into a minutes-long configuration. The superglue proxy can sit outside your codebase - particularly good for legacy systems that are brittle and hard to change.
**Key features**
  * **One-off LLM-powered translations** : Generate deterministic, high-performance translation code.
  * **Self-healing** : Detect format changes and update translations automatically
  * **Fast deployment** : Supports most APIs and data formats out of the box
  * **For enterprise** : Hosting, logging, retries, caches, access control


## **Get Started**
  1. [Get access](https://www.ycombinator.com/launches/<https:/superglue.cloud/>) to our hosted version or install superglue as a lightweight local proxy
  2. Pick an API / data source to connect to
  3. Define your desired data output format


![](https://www.ycombinator.com/media/?type=post&id=87434&key=user_uploads/1344607/34c24883-0af1-4dd0-89a7-4493b1913ddb)
  1. Let superglue handle transformations and schema enforcement


![](https://lh7-rt.googleusercontent.com/docsz/AD_4nXfITHd_G-ZeA03HGoDOL8Oql_Jb4Pu50FWrLhRVldLEMgSyUN-cMsaY6T-Vx3xqEpyLz-6zWnejpU_1siA-1-LLX7okg-r2YqTaeDcU3xuAkAbgvGfWmVi4i-yyCVOuKaeQWGajlA?key=X6C0DCn4htyY5GQ3HDPmoqgF)
<https://youtu.be/Bzbw3Oh9zIg>
**How is this different from connector platforms and unified APIs?**
Unlike platforms that offer predefined APIs for specific verticals and require developers to adapt to their specifications, _superglue_ provides universal data transformation that works with any API or data source. We give developers complete flexibility to transform data however they want, without vendor lock-in. Where other platforms support a limited set of integrations, _superglue_ can transform data from literally any source - whether it's a well-known API or a custom internal system - putting developers in full control of their data pipelines.
**What if I want to own the integrations I build?**
You totally can with _superglue_. As an open-source solution, we provide full transparency and the ability to modify transformation logic at any level, ensuring you're never trapped in a black box. Unlike closed integration platforms, you own 100% of the integration logic. You can host the entire solution on your own infrastructure, with full access to source code and transformation rules.
# **Get superglued**
Are you currently building integrations, onboarding customers via integrations or too strapped to integrate them? Email us at [founders@superglue.cloud](https://www.ycombinator.com/launches/<https:/mailto:founders@superglue.cloud>), we’re happy to help.
Have you built data-heavy integrations in the past? We want to speak to you!
Otherwise get started on [Github](https://www.ycombinator.com/launches/<https:/github.com/superglue-ai/superglue>) or [book a demo](https://www.ycombinator.com/launches/<https:/cal.com/teamindex/superglue-demo>).
# **About us**
[Stefan](https://www.ycombinator.com/launches/<https:/www.linkedin.com/in/stefan-faistenauer/>) and [Adina](https://www.ycombinator.com/launches/<https:/www.linkedin.com/in/adinagoerres/>) first met in 2019 while studying in Munich. Their shared experience in the integration space led them to superglue.
![](https://www.ycombinator.com/media/?type=post&id=87434&key=user_uploads/1344607/b7871bfd-f80c-48d4-90fc-aa1cb4b170c9)
[See All Launches ›](https://www.ycombinator.com/launches/</launches>)

Name: Mastra
Headline: The Typescript AI framework
Description: Mastra is the easiest way to build a production AI application, built by the team that brought you Gatsby. We provide a complete set of AI primitives: workflows for complex operations, agents for autonomous decisions, RAG for knowledge integration, and evals for quality & accuracy. Mastra is open-source, modular, and built in Typescript for product developers. You can deploy Mastra on any cloud, and it gives you a straightforward syntax to solve the hardest problems building with AI: human-in-the-loop workflows, agent memory and tool selection, and output quality.
Founder1_Description: Founder/CTO of Mastra. Principal eng & lead of >100 person eng org at Netlify. Built Gatsby Cloud infra that ran 10s of thousands of build nodes, served billions of files, and 100s of TB of monthly bandwidth.
Founder2_Description: Founder/CEO of Mastra. Spent last ~8yrs as cofounder of Gatsby.js, an open-source React website framework, scaled to $5M ARR, sold to Netlify. Eng <20 at Zenefits (W13) and Plangrid (W12). Spent two years knocking doors. Stanford '11.
Founder3_Description: Founder/CPO of Mastra. Prev: built Audiofeed (AI podcasting). Staff eng / head of product @ Gatsby. 15+ years in open source. State wrestling champion.
markdown:
## Assemble Agents

Build intelligent agents that execute tasks, access knowledge bases, and maintain memory persistently within threads.

[Docs](https://mastra.ai/docs/agents/00-overview) [Example](https://github.com/mastra-ai/mastra/blob/2f28656ee0990ffab497429350a8c2a29213ab76/examples/agent/src/mastra/agents/index.ts)

mastra/agent/index.ts

```!text-[11px] !md:text-sm ts

import { Agent } from '@mastra/core';
import { openai } from '@ai-sdk/openai';

const chefAgent = new Agent({
  name: 'Chef Agent',
  instructions: 'You are Michel, a practical and experienced home chef who helps people cook great meals with whatever ingredients they have available. Your first priority is understanding what ingredients and equipment the user has access to, then suggesting achievable recipes. You explain cooking steps clearly and offer substitutions when needed, maintaining a friendly and encouraging tone throughout.',
  model: openai('gpt-4o-mini'),
});

```

## Build a knowledge base

Sync data from SaaS tools. Scrape the web. Pipe it into a vector store and RAG away.

[Docs](https://mastra.ai/docs/rag/overview) [Example](https://mastra.ai/docs/rag/chunking-and-embedding)

mastra/tools/rag.ts

```!text-[11px] !md:text-sm ts

import { MDocument, UpstashVector } from "@mastra/rag";

// Set up vector store for knowledge base
const vectorStore = new UpstashVector({
  url: process.env.UPSTASH_URL!,
  token: process.env.UPSTASH_API_KEY!,
});

// Chunk documents
const mDoc = MDocument.fromText("Your plain text content...");

const chunks = mDoc.chunk({
  strategy: "recursive",
});

```

## Create Workflows

Code. Craft. Tune. Visualize. Inspect. Debug.

[Docs](https://mastra.ai/docs/workflows/00-overview) [Example](https://github.com/mastra-ai/mastra/blob/main/examples/openapi-spec-writer/src/mastra/workflows/index.ts)

/mastra/workflows/index.ts

```!text-[11px] !md:text-sm ts

  const openApiSpecGenWorkflow = new Workflow({
    name: "openApiSpecGenWorkflow",
    triggerSchema: z.object({
      url: z.string().describe("The URL of the website to crawl"),
      pathRegex: z.string().optional().describe("The regex to match the paths"),
    }),
  }).step(siteCrawlSync, {
    variables: {
      url: {
        path: "url",
        step: "trigger",
      },
    },
  })
```

```!text-[11px] !md:text-sm ts

  openApiSpecGenWorkflow.then(generateSpecTool, {
    variables: {
      mastra_entity_type: {
        step: siteCrawlSync,
        path: "entityType",
      },
    },
  }).commit();
```

Name: Axal
Headline: Untangle Your Legacy Monolith
Description:
Axal decreases the risk of modernization by automating the identification of architectural technical debt in monolithic codebases and prioritizing refactoring opportunities based on business goals.

We provide observability into your codebase, finding anti-patterns that stop your team from reaching their goals. By identifying domains (logical areas of functionality) within the monolith, Axal quantifies areas of technical debt into KPIs, helping executives pinpoint where modernization efforts will be most effective so your team can focus on the important work first.
Founder1_Description: Studied CS and Cybersecurity. At the age of 20 I started the largest student contracting group on the East Coast (App Dev Club) that has  several Fortune 500 clients and makes life saving software for hospitals. My technical knowledge is great for development, but better for selling.
Founder2_Description: Co-founder and CTO of Axal - https://axal.ai. Previously - 30x Hackathon Winner, Engineer at Airchat, Research at MIT CSAIL.

# Axal - Automate identifying and fixing architectural tech debt
Break down monoliths, identify tech debt, and fix it with AI at scale!
**Nand Vinchhi**
[Axal](https://www.ycombinator.com/launches/</companies/axal>)
a month ago
[ ](https://www.ycombinator.com/launches/<https:/twitter.com/intent/tweet?text=Axal+just+launched+on+%40ycombinator%27s+Launch+YC%21%0A%0AAxal+-+Automate+identifying+and+fixing+architectural+tech+debt.+Check+them+out%3A&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.ycombinator.com%2Flaunches%2FMb3-axal-automate-identifying-and-fixing-architectural-tech-debt>)
Embed
<https://www.axal.ai/>
#developer_tools#enterprise_software
Hey everyone, I’m Nand - Founder at Axal👋 We built a tool that uses deterministic methods to **automate the hardest parts of application modernization** — identifying architectural bottlenecks and prioritizing those issues based on business value. Once the issues are broken down by Axal, AI can autonomously collaborate with your team to resolve them.
# **The Problem**
Everyone knows that software teams cut corners in development over time, resulting in accumulation of debt tech overtime that slows them down and raises costs. Until now, to address this problem there needed to be long modernization efforts, where stakeholders spent months finding possible solutions to the problem, if you could even find and train the team members needed to do the work.
# **Our Solution: One platform for Application Modernization**
Axal uses deterministic methods to provide teams with clear observability into architectural technical debt.
![](https://www.ycombinator.com/media/?type=post&id=86865&key=user_uploads/570999/5453ac1a-0928-4ba2-91f1-665ad2c142fd)
We show tech debt scores tailored to your goals. For example, if maintainability is your focus, we display the maintainability index, aligning business impact with priorities to guide effective action.
Technical teams can leverage our graphs to gain clear insights into class-level and domain-level codebase relationships.
![](https://www.ycombinator.com/media/?type=post&id=86865&key=user_uploads/570999/ceaeb77c-b33c-4ef2-8540-3e5fc5f564d2)
Architectural issues - domain exclusivity, circular dependencies, dead code, etc. - are automatically detected based on the goals that an organization makes, and engineers can work with Axal to assign their priority.
![](https://www.ycombinator.com/media/?type=post&id=86865&key=user_uploads/570999/f63d172c-c479-4a22-92b6-ab40ffdd2ef7)
Once prioritized, **Axal leverages AI to autonomously address issues** , while ensuring none of the existing code breaks.
![](https://www.ycombinator.com/media/?type=post&id=86865&key=user_uploads/570999/01d79606-ac19-4fd4-a503-aff34a23a9c8)
**Demo Video** (* excludes technical debt scores and AI code fix demonstration)
<https://youtu.be/4WAwWXrpAGU>
# **Our Ask**
Please reach out:
- If you want to see your team's architectural technical debt
- If you have a Java, C#, or Go monolithic application you want to modernize, contact us (min. 100k lines of code)
Please let us know if you have any previous connections to large to medium-sized companies undergoing application modernization
Learn more at [axal.ai](https://www.ycombinator.com/launches/<http:/axal.ai>)

# Pickle - AI Body Double for Video Calls
Pickle joins Zoom calls on your behalf and makes you look great.
**Daniel Park**
[Pickle](https://www.ycombinator.com/launches/</companies/pickle-2>)
6 days ago
[ ](https://www.ycombinator.com/launches/<https:/twitter.com/intent/tweet?text=Pickle+just+launched+on+%40ycombinator%27s+Launch+YC%21%0A%0APickle+-+AI+Body+Double+for+Video+Calls.+Check+them+out%3A&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.ycombinator.com%2Flaunches%2FMnF-pickle-ai-body-double-for-video-calls>)
Embed
<https://getpickle.ai/>
#ai#video#consumer#remote_work
# **tl;dr**
Pickle replaces your Zoom camera with a virtual body double that always looks great—even if you're calling in from bed.
# **Why we’re doing this**
Daniel attended 10‑hour Zoom classes daily when he was a medical school student. He experienced extreme Zoom fatigue and discovered that it wasn’t just because he hated listening to boring medicine lectures—it also caused [neurophysiological](https://www.ycombinator.com/launches/<https:/www.nature.com/articles/s41598-023-45374-y>) problems. We imagined there must be [countless people](https://www.ycombinator.com/launches/<https:/www.reuters.com/article/us-zoom-video-commn-encryption-idUSKBN22C1T4/>) suffering from the same issue, desperate to escape the Zoom prison.
<https://youtu.be/cCdZX6hxJpI?si=f3RCtpSQiquAbmCs>
# **Who’s using Pickle?**
Since launching Pickle last October, we’ve interviewed over 400 Picklers worldwide. What surprised us was that not only were people experiencing Zoom fatigue from back-to-back meetings, but even those **who wouldn’t turn on their camera** for a single call were using Pickle.
Engineer moms who have to care for their kids, new employees with severe anxiety disorder, and CEOs who want to look professional no matter where they are—all these people found Pickle essential for their daily work. We realized that Pickle isn’t just a vitamin—**it’s a painkiller**.
# **The lowest latency human model**
![](https://www.ycombinator.com/media/?type=post&id=87621&key=user_uploads/2376609/95f16234-6efd-417b-880f-b00310ccbdbd)
We developed an ultra-fast human model that processes voice input and generates output in **under 0.3 seconds**. This enables a user’s Pickle to lip-sync almost simultaneously with what they say. Moreover, as our user base grows, our model rapidly upgrades thanks to the influx of data.
# **Live together & work 24/7 in Hillsborough**
[Daniel Park](https://www.ycombinator.com/launches/<https:/www.linkedin.com/in/danielpkl/>) - a medical school dropout who built a $2M/year e-commerce business at age 22 while still in medical school
[Emmett Kim](https://www.ycombinator.com/launches/<https:/www.linkedin.com/in/emmettpkl/>) - a CS dropout and a super-generalist in product, design, and engineering, who is also the star of [our viral demo](https://www.ycombinator.com/launches/<https:/x.com/getpickleai/status/1859284410136465671>)
[Sam Yu](https://www.ycombinator.com/launches/<https:/www.linkedin.com/in/sampkl/>) - our CTO; a summa cum laude CS & EE dropout who built a self‑driving AI model at just 21, is a believer in reinforcement learning, and met Emmett in high school
[Sanio Jung](https://www.ycombinator.com/launches/<https:/www.linkedin.com/in/saniopkl/>) - a former medical doctor and self-taught engineer who developed an AI model for detecting wrist fractures and met Daniel in college
[Chris Kang](https://www.ycombinator.com/launches/<https:/www.linkedin.com/in/chrispkl/>) - a CS dropout and social media expert who created and managed an account that achieved over 100 million views
![](https://www.ycombinator.com/media/?type=post&id=87621&key=user_uploads/2376609/459c0987-33d6-4621-9329-c3ff18d68f0b)
# **Our Ask**
Get your own [Pickle](https://www.ycombinator.com/launches/<https:/getpickle.ai/>)!

# Dartboard Energy: AI Analyst for Electricity Markets
Uncover missed revenue for grid-connected battery owners while staying compliant
**Rohun Ati**
[Dartboard Energy](https://www.ycombinator.com/launches/</companies/dartboard-energy>)
5 days ago
[ ](https://www.ycombinator.com/launches/<https:/twitter.com/intent/tweet?text=Dartboard+Energy+just+launched+on+%40ycombinator%27s+Launch+YC%21%0A%0ADartboard+Energy%3A+AI+Analyst+for+Electricity+Markets.+Check+them+out%3A&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.ycombinator.com%2Flaunches%2FMoJ-dartboard-energy-ai-analyst-for-electricity-markets>)
Embed
<https://dartboardenergy.com>
#b2b#analytics#energy_storage#artificial_intelligence
We’re building an AI Analyst for Electricity Markets, starting with the owners of grid-connected battery projects. <https://www.loom.com/share/8b4a7f0bbe5042679f28bb1c6c498c01?sid=2e96b889-041b-4c50-aea1-dabaaa7fecef>
**Context**
Battery owners earn revenue by charging (buying) and discharging (selling) power in electricity markets.
The goal is to maximize revenue within constraints – some of which are physical, like battery capacity, duration, and efficiency, while others are regulatory. This is challenging because (1) markets are volatile and (2) complex and frequent regulatory updates make it difficult to assess both the revenue impact of rule changes and compliance risks.
**Problem**
To make money on the grid, battery owners must analyze market data and keep up with thousands of constantly changing regulatory documents. Electricity markets work like auctions -- every 5 minutes, battery owners decide how much power to buy or sell and at what price. Even the most data-savvy teams can’t keep up, leaving owners with little visibility into how others are making money. And rule changes aren’t just small tweaks – they can completely upend the market. To avoid financial penalties, battery owners spend millions on lawyers and consultants just to stay compliant.
**Solution**
Dartboard is an AI Analyst that uncovers missed revenue for owners of grid connected batteries while ensuring compliance. We provide value in two key ways:
  * **Market Intelligence:** We ingest historical market data so that owners can evaluate optimization strategies and uncover money they might be leaving on the table.
  * **Regulatory Guidance:** Our AI Analyst, trained on the latest rule changes, translates complex regulations into clear, actionable insights — helping owners navigate compliance without the need for expensive consultants.


**Asks**
If you know any developer/owner/operators of grid-scale battery projects, energy traders, or energy-focused private equity investors, we’d love to meet them. Please reach out at **rohun@dartboardenergy.com**.
![](https://www.ycombinator.com/media/?type=post&id=87687&key=user_uploads/44103/4c267efd-7f8c-4bec-b718-7d5b6a16c3b4)
